original: It stings rather. [If you ever have three Wounds, you're dead. They will heal when you rest in your Lodgings, and from time to time at zee.]
translation: 更疼了。 [一旦你的伤势达到3, 你就会死。 在住处休息会治愈你, 有时海中的事件也会治愈。]

original: Menaces: Yearning, Burning
translation: 威胁: 渴望, 燃烧

original: Milebreaker
translation: 里程粉碎机

original: This frankly sinister device reduces the amount of fuel that an engine uses. It also really frightens the crew. Apparently, that's necessary.
translation: 这个事实上非常邪恶的设备可以减少你的引擎消耗的燃料。 它同时也会吓到你的船员。 但是显然,它很有用。

original: Mirrors
translation: 镜子值

original: Detection and perception. The higher your Mirrors, the quicker you can find a firing solution in combat.
translation: 探测与感知。 你的镜子值越高, 你在战斗中开火的流程就会越短。

original: Monkey Foundling
translation: 猴子遗孤

original: Raised by the Empire of Hands, she longs to see the wonders of the Neath.
translation: 被手掌帝国抚养成长, 她渴望看到地下世界的奇观.

original: Monstrous Almanac
translation: 巨量的图鉴

original: A stack of notebooks, closely written in treasure-ink.
translation: 一堆笔记本, 上面是用珍贵的墨水写的密密麻麻的东西。

original: Montaigne Projector
translation: 蒙恬的投影仪

original: Get back. Get back! Don't look at it directly!
translation: 快回来. 快回来! 不要直视它!

original: Mountain-sherd
translation: 死亡租界

original: This was struck from the side of the Mountain-of-Light, who is the god called Stone. It is holy: treat it accordingly. [If you don't treat it as holy, it can still be sold as a Captivating Treasure.]
translation: 这是从光明之山的边缘划下的一小块, 光明之山就是被人们称为石头的神。 它是神圣的: 对它尊重一点。 [如果你不觉得它神圣, 它依旧可以被当做迷人的财宝出售。]

original: Mouse: So Little Time
translation: 老鼠: 时间很短

original: Increase your Cat to 50 before this reaches 1...
translation: 在老鼠值降到1之前把你的猫值提升到50...

original: Moves in the Great Game
translation: 大博弈中的动向

original: The nations of Europe, and beyond, compete for influence. Their plots reach even to the Neath. [The Admiral and the Diplomat, among others, will be interested to hear this.]
translation: 欧洲和更远地方的国家, 正在为影响力进行竞争。 他们的密谋甚至到达了地下。 [将军和外交官, 会比其他人对此更感兴趣。]

original: Mr Sacks
translation: 麻袋先生

original: The Crimson Beast of Winter lurks in your hold.
translation: 冬日的猩红禽兽蛰伏在你的船舱之中.

original: Mt Nomad's Heart
translation: 流浪之山的心

original: In the depths of the mountain lay a great egg of smooth gold. Once every hour, it pulses with slow and deadly life.
translation: 在山的深处放置着一枚光滑的金色蛋。 每小时一次, 它会慢慢的毫无生机地跳动一下。

original: Mutersalt
translation: 沉默盐

original: Tastes like clean air and crystallised ginger. Also has the interesting property of paralysing the vocal chords if you sprinkle it in your stew.
translation: 尝起来就像新鲜的空气和姜汁的结晶。它还有着一个奇怪的性质,如果你把它洒在炖肉里,它能够暂时麻痹声带。

original: Mutton Island: Another Day
translation: 羊岛: 又一天

original: Everything is quiet. That probably means that everything is fine.
translation: 一切都很安静. 那可能意味着一切都还好.

original: Mutton Island: Refugee Crisis
translation: 羊岛: 难民危机

original: You can only rescue so many before the island is fully locked down.
translation: 在岛屿完全封闭之前你只能尽力救人。

original: Mutton Island: Refugees
translation: 羊岛: 难民

original: They made it to your boat. Take them to the Shepherd Isles.
translation: 他们上了你的小艇。 带他们去牧羊人群岛。

original: Mutton Island: The Airs Of Mutton Island
translation: 羊岛: 羊岛环境

original: The islands of the zee are always in motion
translation: 海泽中的岛屿一直在变化

original: Nacreous Outcast
translation: 珍珠流放者

original: Its brothers and sisters have abandoned it. Pearly light drips from its mantle-crest. The Principles have touched it, and not gently. But it can work miracles with salt and fish-flesh...
translation: 它的兄弟姐妹抛弃了它。 珍珠色的光从它的头冠上发出。 珊瑚之源曾经碰过它, 而且是用不那么温柔的方法。 但是它烹饪鱼肉和盐的手法简直就是个奇迹。。。

original: Nacreous Survivor
translation: 珍珠幸存者

original: Pearly light still drips from its mantle-crest. But it has survived the Principles... and won something in the process.
translation: 珍珠色的光依旧从他的头冠上发出。 但是它从珊瑚之源中活了下来。。。 并且在其中赢得了某些东西。

original: Navigator's Counsel
translation: 领航员的忠告

original: Advice awaits you. [You acquired this from Fallen London: it'll be available for all new characters.]
translation: 建议在等着你。 [你从Fallen London游戏中得到了这: 它对所有的新角色都有用。]

original: Nephrite Ring
translation: 软玉指环

original: A token permitting you to trade in the Khanate.
translation: 在汗国进行交易的许可证.

original: Networks: A Diplomatic Agent
translation: 间谍网络: 一名外交人员

original: This one keeps out of the way. [They will sometimes be needed to improve an espionage network]
translation: 这一个避开了。 [他们有时会需要你提升间谍网络的等级]

original: Networks: An Opportunity - Khan's Heart
translation: 间谍网络 - 一个机会: 可汗之心

original: Your network needs you.
translation: 你的间谍网络需要你。

original: Networks: An Opportunity - Port Carnelian
translation: 间谍网络 - 一个机会: 玛瑙港

original: Your network needs you.
translation: 你的间谍网络需要你.

original: Networks: Khan's Heart
translation: 间谍网络: 可汗之心

original: You have spies in Khan's Heart.
translation: 你在可汗之心安插了间谍。

original: Networks: Port Carnelian
translation: 间谍网络: 玛瑙港

original: You have spies in Port Carnelian.
translation: 你在玛瑙港安插了间谍.

original: NewBruiser
translation: 新大汉

original: The Bruiser has new assignments.
translation: 大汉有个新任务。

original: NewMutton
translation: 新羊岛

original: You are playing New Mutton Island
translation: 你正在玩弄新羊岛

original: Nobody's Daughter
translation: 佚名的女儿

original: She's a little more sombre than she used to be.
translation: 她看起来比以前阴郁了一些。

original: Nook: A Chattering
translation: 旮旯: 一阵颤动

original: The strange goings on in Nook force its people to be unusually wary.
translation: 旮旯中奇怪的事情使得其居民异常谨慎。

original: Nook: A Memory of Nook
translation: 旮旯: 关于旮旯的回忆

original: A triumph? A regret? Either way, it lingers in your mind.
translation: 胜利? 悔恨? 无论如何, 这都会留在你心中。

original: Nook: A Player of Games
translation: 旮旯: 一名游戏玩家

original: You've some experience playing Snaplamprey.
translation: 你有了些玩折鳃鳗的经历.

original: Nook: A Taste of Backwash
translation: 旮旯: 逆流的味道

original: Try not to think of how many lungs, kidneys and lower tracts this water has passed through.
translation: 试着不要想这些水经过了多少肺, 腰子, 呼吸道之类的东西。

original: Nook: A Taste of Freedom
translation: 旮旯: 自由的味道

original: It can leave a bitter aftertaste.
translation: 回味起来有点苦.

original: Nook: Phosphorescent Nodule
translation: 旮旯: 发光团块

original: It glows softly. Enough to light your way in Nook.
translation: 它发着柔光。 足够照亮你进入旮旯的路程。

original: Nook: The Currents of Nook
translation: 旮旯: 旮旯的水流

original: Freedom is never stagnant.
translation: 自由永不污浊。

original: Nook: The Depths of the Maw
translation: 旮旯: 大嘴深处

original: How far down will you go in search of treasure?
translation: 你要走多远去寻宝?

original: Nook: The Memory of the Beast
translation: 旮旯: 巨兽的记忆

original: You briefly became part of something ancient.
translation: 你一度成为了某种古代之物的一部分。

original: Nook: Tolerance for Nookwater
translation: 旮旯: 忍受旮旯的水

original: The more of it you breathe, the less you remember air.
translation: 你呼吸越多, 你对空气的记忆就越少。

original: Nook: Treasures of the Maw
translation: 旮旯: 大嘴里的财宝

original: What salvage has sunk down here over the centuries?
translation: 几个世纪以来都有什么东西沉到了这里?

original: Nook: Trusted
translation: 旮旯: 信任

original: You have done the people of Nook great service. They begrudge your presence less than that of other bubble-mouths.
translation: 你帮了旮旯的人们一个大忙。 他们比其他冒着泡泡的大嘴更珍惜你的存在。

original: Nuncio: Cultivating Friendships with Postmen
translation: 农西奥: 培养和邮差的友谊

original: The inhabitants of Nuncio are slow to friendship, and suspicious.
translation: 农西奥的居民对友谊很迟钝,而且抱有怀疑态度.

original: Nuncio: Deliverance
translation: 农西奥: 释放

original: You gave a postman an opportunity to leave Nuncio.
translation: 你给了一名邮差离开农西奥的机会。

original: Nuncio: Learned in Postal Secrets
translation: 农西奥: 了解了邮局的秘密

original: You are discovering how things are at Nuncio.
translation: 你发现了农西奥的事情是怎么回事.

original: Nuncio: Worker in Dead Letters
translation: 农西奥: 死信中的工人

original: Experienced in shift work at the Dead Letter Office.
translation: 对死信办公室里的值班工作很有经验。

original: Objective: Ambition
translation: 目标: 志向

original: How do you want it all to end? [This determines how you win: although you can always just retire in London, for a draw.]
translation: 你究竟想要什么? [这决定了你的胜利方式: 尽管你随时可以选择在伦敦退休作为一种折中的选择。]

original: Objective: An Admiralty Commission
translation: 目标: 将军的委托

original: The Admiralty has a task for you. Visit the named port to retrieve Strategic Intelligence, and return it to the Admiralty.
translation: 将军有个任务给你. 访问特定的港口来收取战略情报,然后回到将军这里.

original: Objective: An Assignment for the Cheery Man
translation: 目标: 笑脸叔的任务

original: He does not tolerate fools or failure.
translation: 他从不接受失败的傻瓜。

original: Objective: Collecting Cargo for the Cheery Man
translation: 目标: 为笑脸叔收货物

original: You've been asked to pick up a package and return it to London. Don't come back without it.
translation: 你被要求收集一个包裹并返回伦敦。不要空手回来。

original: Objective: Deliver News of the Philanthropist's Husband
translation: 目标: 递送关于慈善家丈夫的新闻

original: She waits in Port Carnelian.
translation: 她在玛瑙港等你.

original: Objective: Deliveries from the Salt Lions
translation: 目标: 盐狮的运输任务

original: The uses of the stone are mysterious. Where must you take it?
translation: 这些石材的用途是个谜。你必须把它们送到哪里?

original: Objective: Encounters with the Wistful Deviless
translation: 目标: 遇见怅然若失的恶魔

original: She's the guardian of the Brimstone Convention. Apparently.
translation: 很显然,她是硫磺公约的一名守卫。

original: Objective: Kingdom
translation: 目标: 王国

original: You've found a hidden Ambition! Colonise and improve Aestival to found your own kingdom.
translation: 你发现了隐藏的志向! 殖民并开发阿斯蒂沃来建立你自己的王国。

original: Objective: Materials for the Impeller
translation: 目标: 涡轮机的材料

original: "We need once-living monster-material. And since we can't get the heart of the Bazaar (no, we really can't), we'll need something from the Dawn Machine. Sorry."[Take one Element of Dawn, one Casket of Sapphires, and forty units of Stygian Ivory, along with the Mechanic's Secret and the Unsettling Sage, to Kingeater's Castle.]
translation: "我们需要曾经活着过的怪物材料。 因为我们没法拿到巴扎的心 (不,我们真的做不到), 我们会需要从黎明机器那里拿来的一些东西。 抱歉。"[带来一个黎明元素, 一桶蓝宝石, 还有四十单位的阴暗黑骨, 带着机械师的秘密和令人不安的贤者,去噬王者的城堡。]

original: Objective: Seeking a Gift for the Pirate-King
translation: 目标: 寻找给海盗王的礼物

original: Even Pirate-Kings like their courtesies
translation: 即使是海盗王也会很受用这些礼节

original: Objective: The Avuncular Broker's Little Problem
translation: 目标: 慈祥的中间人的小麻烦

original: You are investigating Snuffers.
translation: 你正在调查食烛者.

original: Objective: The Box from the Sea
translation: 目标: 从海中得到的盒子

original: You are seeking the phrase that will open a whisper-locked sea-chest.
translation: 你正在寻找可以打开海中捞上的密语锁箱的密语。

original: Objective: The Mechanic's Secret in Frostfound
translation: 目标: 机械师在寒霜城的秘密

original: "I had to hide the Secret somewhere the Fingerkings couldn't go. I hoped they'd leave me alone then. So I put it in Frostfound. Not the very heart of Frostfound. I'm not insane. But, um, quite close to the heart." [Find Frostfound, in the north, and retrieve the Mechanic's secret from the penultimate chamber.]
translation: "我必须把这个秘密藏在指尖王到不了的地方。 我希望在那之后他们不会继续打扰我。 所以我把它放在了寒霜城。 不是寒霜城的正中心。 我没疯。 但是,恩,它离寒霜城的正中心很近。" [找到北方的寒霜城, 在倒数第二间密室找到机械师的秘密。]

original: Objective: The Unsettling Sage
translation: 目标: 令人不安的贤者

original: "I'll need help to build the engine. It'll need to be alive, like the Pigs, and I'm, er, better at metal." [Rescue or ransom him from Wisdom, in the Sea of Lilies near the Khanate to help the Tireless Mechanic complete his project.]
translation: "我在制造引擎的时候需要帮助。它需要是活着的, 比如那石猪, 还有我, 呃, 很擅长金工。" [从智慧监狱营救或者赎出来他, 智慧监狱位于汗国附近的莲花海中。他能帮助机械师完成工程。]

original: Objective: The Venturer's Venture
translation: 目标: 冒险家的冒险计划

original: He has a plan.
translation: 他有个计划.

original: Objective: Tomb-Colonists
translation: 目标: 死亡侨民

original: Just what precisely is their problem?
translation: 他们的问题具体是什么?

original: Objective: Venturer's Desire
translation: 目标: 冒险家的欲望

original: He wants...
translation: 他想要。。。

original: Obscure Energies
translation: 无名能量

original: Your ship's instrumentation relies on the energies of night. You may employ Unclear Devices.
translation: 你船上的仪器依赖于夜晚的能量。 你也许使用了不明仪器。

original: OldPigmote
translation: 老皮格莫特

original: You are playing with the original Pigmote Isle
translation: 你正在玩弄原始的皮格莫特岛

original: Outlandish Artefact
translation: 异国的工艺品

original: This belongs in a museum! Assuming that colonial-imperial appropriation for the purpose of hegemonic taxonomisation is a suitable response to the problem of intercultural contact. Which it probably is, because museums are magnificent institutions.  [If you've made an Ironclad Will, you can convert a collection of these into an Heirloom for your successor.]
translation: 这个属于博物馆!假定殖民帝国对税务支配权进行拨款是对不同文化间接触的合理反应。也许吧, 因为博物馆是个复杂而庞大的官僚机构。  [如果你订立了遗嘱,你可以把这个转化为一件继承物来留给你的继任者。]

original: Oxygen
translation: 氧气

original: Without oxygen, your zubmarine is merely a metal tomb.
translation: 没有氧气的话, 你的潜艇就仅仅是个金属坟墓.

original: Pages
translation: 书页值

original: Esoteric and occasionally practical knowledge. [Increases the speed at which you convert Fragments to Secrets.]
translation: 晦涩但是有时却很实用的知识。 [增加你将碎片转化为秘密的速度。]

original: Parabolan Kitten
translation: 帕布拉的小猫

original: Hold up a mirror and see its other self: a panther cub, grey as night-fog but touched with amber.
translation: 举起一面镜子看着镜子中的它: 一只豹子的幼崽, 身上长着像午夜雾气一样的灰色绒毛,但是透着琥珀的光泽。

original: Parabolan Panther
translation: 帕布拉豹

original: A dignified tortoiseshell-tabby, notable mainly for her fondness for mackerel. But the zailors treat her with exaggerated respect. They've seen what she looks like in a mirror...
translation: 一只威严的琥珀色大猫, 因为其对马鲛鱼的爱好而闻名。 但是水手对待她总是带有一种夸张的尊敬。 他们见过她在镜子中的样子。。。

original: Peculiar Noises
translation: 特别的噪音

original: Phorcyd-class Corvette
translation: 普罗赛德级武装快艇

original: Small, swift and formidable, like a very angry vole.
translation: 小而敏捷,令人畏惧,就像一只发怒的野鼠.

original: Pigmote Isle: A Dilemma
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 进退两难

original: How will you advise?
translation: 你的建议是?

original: Pigmote Isle: Civilisation
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 文明之光

original: A nation must build. If this reaches 0, bad things will happen on Pigmote Isle.
translation: 一定要建立一个国家。 如果这达到0, 皮格莫特岛上会发生不好的事情。

original: Pigmote Isle: Mastery
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 统治与征服

original: Two houses, alike in dignity. Not that this is saying much, mind.
translation: 两股势力,相似的权威。请注意言行。

original: Pigmote Isle: Might
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 力量

original: A nation must be strong. If this reaches 0, bad things will happen on Pigmote Isle.
translation: 国家一定要强大。 如果这达到0, 皮格莫特岛上会发生不好的事情。

original: Pigmote Isle: Progress Of A Nation
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 建国之路

original: Time passes on the Neath's most adorable empire.
translation: 地下世界最可爱的帝国中,时间正在流逝.

original: Pigmote Isle: Spirit
translation: 皮格莫特岛: 精神

original: A nation needs hope. If this reaches 0, bad things will happen on Pigmote Isle.
translation: 国家需要希望。 如果这达到0, 皮格莫特岛上会发生不好的事情。

original: Pirate-Poet's Heart
translation: 海盗诗人之心

original: Like a human heart, but not very. After all, in the end, she was only clay.
translation: 像人类的心, 但不是很像。毕竟,最后,她只是粘土。

original: Plausible Surgeon
translation: 看似可靠的医生

original: He probably won't saw the wrong limb off.
translation: 他可能不会锯错腿.

original: Playing Cat and Mouse with an Evasive Target
translation: 和一个正在逃避的目标做猫鼠游戏

original: But who is the cat, and who the mouse?
translation: 但是谁是猫,谁是鼠?

original: Pneumatic Delivery
translation: 气动老鼠传输机

original: Your ship enjoys the benefits of pneumatic engineering.
translation: 你的船正在享受气动传输带来的好处。

original: Presbyterate Adventuress
translation: 古大陆的女探险家

original: Perhaps she's afraid of being forgotten. She isn't afraid of much else.
translation: 也许她害怕被忘记。 但是除此之外她无所畏惧。

original: Price Unpaid
translation: 未付的报酬

original: This is the Price Unpaid.
translation: 这是个未付的报酬.

original: Principles' End: A Fluke-Core
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局:一个海胆核心

original: "And bring me a Fluke-Core. For my Kin."
translation: "给我带来海胆的核心,作为我的王。"

original: Principles' End: A Little Flint
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局: 一小块燧石

original: "Bring me a little flint, to be my new Paw," the Principles said
translation: "带给我一小块燧石, 作为我的卒," 珊瑚之源说

original: Principles' End: A Monster's Tooth
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局: 怪物的牙齿

original: "Bring me a monster's tooth, to be my new Night.", the Principles said
translation: "给我带来怪物的牙齿, 作为我新的骑士。", 珊瑚之源说

original: Principles' End: A Wakeful Idol
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局: 一个警觉的雕像

original: "Bring me a Wakeful Idol, to be my new Bishop," the Principles said
translation: "带给我一个警觉的雕像, 做我的新主教," 珊瑚之源说

original: Principles' End: Heart-Shelled Silver
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局: 心壳银

original: "Bring me heart-shelled silver, to be my new Root", the Principles said.
translation: "心壳银, 作为我的新堡垒", 珊瑚之源说。

original: Principles' End: Principality
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局: 珊瑚国度

original: The coral is changing...
translation: 珊瑚正在变化...

original: Principles' End: Principled Competition
translation: 珊瑚之源的结局:有原则的比赛

original: You have made your mark in the chess-contests of the Principles of Coral.
translation: 你在珊瑚之源的象棋比赛中有了自己的记号。

original: Prisoner
translation: 囚犯

original: You have confined this unfortunate to a cage in the hold. [Prisoners survive on scraps and do not usually require Supplies. Release your Prisoner by using this item, or take them back to London for other purposes...]
translation: 你把这个倒霉的家伙关在了货仓底的笼子里。 [囚犯靠剩饭维生一般情况下不消耗你的补给品。 通过使用这件物品释放你的囚犯, 或者出于某种目的把他们带回伦敦。。。]

original: Prisoner Freed From Drownies
translation: 从溺亡者处解救的囚犯

original: This former prisoner is travelling to Rosegate.
translation: 这个前囚犯正向玫瑰之门旅行.

original: Propagation: a Light-Ship
translation: 播种: 灯塔船

original: You've sown blemmigans on a Light-Ship.
translation: 你在一艘灯塔船上放了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Abbey Rock
translation: 播种:修道院岩礁

original: You've sown blemmigans on Abbey Rock. No doubt if the nuns object, they'll do something about it.
translation: 你在修道院岩礁放了真菌虫。 毫无疑问如果修女们反对,她们会做出一些反应。

original: Propagation: Adam's Way
translation: 播种: 亚当之路

original: You've sown blemmigans at Adam's Way.
translation: 你在亚当之路放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: Aestival
translation: 播种: 阿斯蒂沃

original: You've dropped blemmigans on Aestival, which seems rather a shame.
translation: 你在阿斯蒂沃放下了真菌虫, 看起来真丢人。

original: Propagation: Anthe
translation: 播种: 安忒

original: You've sown blemmigans at Anthe.
translation: 你在安忒放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: Blemmigans Abroad
translation: 播种: 真菌虫上岸

original: You have graciously transported blemmigans to this many islands.
translation: 你仁慈地把真菌虫带向了那么多的岛屿。

original: Propagation: Dahut
translation: 播种: 达哈

original: You've sown blemmigans at Dahut.
translation: 你在达哈放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: Demeaux Island
translation: 播种: 德莫岛

original: You've sown blemmigans at Demeaux Island.
translation: 你在德莫岛放下了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Empire of Hands
translation: 播种: 手掌帝国

original: You've introduced blemmigans to the Empire of Hands.
translation: 你向手掌帝国介绍了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Gaider's Mourn
translation: 播种: 加德的哀悼

original: You've sown blemmigans on Gaider's Mourn. Perhaps they'll find a foothold somewhere.
translation: 你在加德的哀悼放下了真菌虫。 也许它们能在某处找到安身之地。

original: Propagation: Godfall
translation: 播种: 神落

original: You've sown blemmigans on Godfall. No doubt they will find nutrients in the corridors of the Shattered Citadel.
translation: 你在神落放下了真菌虫。毫无疑问它们能在破碎城堡的走廊里找到养分。

original: Propagation: Hideaway
translation: 播种: 隐逸之地

original: You have sown blemmigans into Hideaway. Perhaps they'll befriend the beast.
translation: 你在隐逸之地放下了真菌虫. 也许他们会和下面的巨兽做朋友.

original: Propagation: Hunter's Keep
translation: 播种: 猎户塔楼

original: You've sown blemmigans on Hunter's Keep.
translation: 你在猎户塔楼放下了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Irem
translation: 播种: 伊瑞暮

original: You've sown blemmigans at Irem. Or, perhaps, you will sow them.
translation: 你在伊瑞暮放下了真菌虫。 或者, 也许, 你将会散播它们。

original: Propagation: Khan's Heart
translation: 播种: 可汗之心

original: You've sown blemmigans at Khan's Heart.
translation: 你在可汗之心放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: Khan's Shadow
translation: 播种: 可汗之影

original: You've sown blemmigans at Khan's Shadow.
translation: 你在可汗之影放下了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Nook
translation: 播种: 旮旯

original: Blemmigans are as happy underwater as anywhere, especially when that water is breathable.
translation: 真菌虫在水下也很开心, 尤其是水可供呼吸的情况下。

original: Propagation: Not Kingeater's Castle
translation: 播种: 不在噬王者的城堡

original: Nothing will take root here.
translation: 没什么能在这里扎根.

original: Propagation: Nuncio
translation: 播种: 农西奥

original: You've sown blemmigans on Nuncio.
translation: 你在农西奥放下了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Pigmote Isle
translation: 播种:皮格莫特岛

original: You've sown blemmigans on Pigmote Isle... perhaps introducing a third term to a delicate equation.
translation: 你在皮格莫特放下了真菌虫。。。也许是在微妙的平衡中引入了第三个势力。

original: Propagation: Polythreme
translation: 播种: 碎心国

original: You've sown blemmigans on Polythreme. Who knows what will come of it?
translation: 你在碎心国放下了真菌虫.谁知道会发生什么事情?

original: Propagation: Port Carnelian
translation: 播种: 玛瑙港

original: You've sown blemmigans at Port Carnelian.
translation: 你在玛瑙港放下了真菌虫。

original: Propagation: Quaker's Haven
translation: 播种: 贵格避风港

original: Propagation: Rosegate
translation: 播种: 玫瑰之门

original: You've sown blemmigans in Rosegate. Hopefully they don't mind smoke.
translation: 你在玫瑰之门放下了真菌虫。 希望他们不介意烟味。

original: Propagation: Saviour's Rocks
translation: 播种: 救世主岩礁

original: You have sown blemmigans at Saviour's Rocks. They'll fill any dark crevice not blocked with cobweb.
translation: 你在救世主岩礁放下了真菌虫。他们会填满所有没被蜘蛛网堵住的黑暗缝隙。

original: Propagation: Scrimshander
translation: 播种: 骨雕馆

original: You have released blemmigans into Scrimshander.
translation: 你在骨雕馆放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: Shepherd Isles
translation: 播种: 牧羊人岛

original: You've sown blemmigans on the Shepherd Isles. No-one will believe it.
translation: 你在牧羊人岛放下了真菌虫。 没人会相信的。

original: Propagation: STATION III
translation: 播种: 3号要塞

original: The blemmigan has crept in through the triple-locked gate.
translation: 真菌虫悄悄潜入了加了三道锁的大门里。

original: Propagation: The Chapel of Lights
translation: 播种: 光之礼拜堂

original: You have sown the Chapel's island with blemmigans. They probably won't enjoy it much.
translation: 你在光之礼拜堂放下了真菌虫。他们不会很享受这些东西的。

original: Propagation: The Chelonate
translation: 播种: 切洛内特

original: You've sown blemmigans at the Chelonate.
translation: 你在切洛内特放下了真菌虫.

original: Propagation: The Fathomking's Hold
translation: 播种: 深寻王的城堡

original: Apparently blemmigans are welcome at the Hold.
translation: 显然真菌虫在城堡里很受欢迎。

original: Propagation: The Gant Pole
translation: 播种: 刚特极点

original: The blemmigan will live well amongst the dead.
translation: 真菌虫在死者之间会过得很好的。

original: Propagation: The Iron Republic
translation: 播种: 钢铁共和国

original: Blemmigans are here. Were here. Or at least will be here.
translation: 真菌虫在这里。 曾经在这里。或至少将要在这里。

original: Propagation: The Isle of Cats
translation: 播种: 猫岛

original: You've sown blemmigans at the Isle of Cats. How will they react to the bees?
translation: 你在猫岛放下了真菌虫. 这会对蜜蜂有什么影响?

original: Propagation: The Mangrove College
translation: 播种: 红树学院

original: Blemmigans flourish among the deep mangroves.
translation: 真菌虫们会在红树林深处茁壮成长。

original: Propagation: The Salt Lions
translation: 播种: 盐狮

original: In the creases of the great stone beast, blemmigans sprout.
translation: 在这些石头巨兽的缝隙里, 真菌虫开始成长。

original: Propagation: The Undercrow
translation: 播种: 爪下

original: You've released blemmigans into the Undercrow.
translation: 你将真菌虫放到了爪下.

original: Propagation: Varchas
translation: 播种: 瓦尔查斯

original: Perhaps your blemmigan walks in the light of Mihir.
translation: 也许你的真菌虫会在米希尔的光照下行走。

original: Propagation: Venderbight
translation: 播种: 文登湾

original: You've brought new, and purple, life to the tomb-colonies.
translation: 你为死亡聚居地带来了些新的, 紫色的生命。

original: Propagation: Visage
translation: 播种: 维瑟吉

original: You've sown blemmigans on Visage. It can hardly make the place any stranger.
translation: 你在维瑟吉放下了真菌虫。 它很难让这个地方变得更陌生。

original: Propagation: Wrack
translation: 播种: 船墟

original: You've sown blemmigans in Wrack.
translation: 你在船墟放下了真菌虫.

original: Quarters
translation: 住处

original: Rattus Faber Assistant
translation: 法布尔鼠助手

original: "You wants someone to take a look inside that." [In combat, Rattus Faber Assistants can be deployed for quicker repairs. It's dangerous work. Don't expect them back.]
translation: "你需要一些人去查看里面。" [法布尔鼠助手对于气动老鼠传输机来说必不可少。]

original: Ray-Drenched Cinder
translation: 放射性矿渣

original: Sizzling with cosmogone light. It has absorbed radiations not of this earth. Some of its colours can only be seen in sleep.
translation: 发出炽热的星海黄色光。 它吸收着不属于这个世界的辐射。 它的一些颜色只能在梦中看到。

original: Recent News
translation: 最新资讯

original: Outlying colonies are often eager for this. [You can't collect more than one Recent News at a time.]
translation: 远方的殖民地通常很渴望这些消息。 [你同时最多持有一份最新资讯。]

original: Restful Night
translation: 安静的一晚

original: You have known a sweet and dreamless sleep. [This will strengthen you when you struggle against Nightmares.]
translation: 你已经经历过甜蜜而无梦的一夜。 [这将会在你对抗梦魇时增强你的力量。]

original: Reuse
translation: 再次使用

original: Revelatory Chart
translation: 秘密海图

original: Oho! [The Dark-Spectacled Admiral will want to see this, if your Admiralty's Favour is high enough.]
translation: 啊呀! [黑墨镜将军会想要看到这个, 如果海军对你的好感足够高.]

original: Review HAPPY
Review please!
Romance: a Child in London
translation: 浪漫: 一个伦敦的孩子

original: Born, sired, or adopted, they're yours.
translation: 出生或者领养, 他们是你的。

original: Romance: a Notable Occasion
translation: 浪漫: 显眼的场合

original: Something has occurred.
translation: 发生了一些事情.

original: Romance: an Affair with...
translation: 浪漫: 和。。。的关系

original: The heart is a heedless hunter. [You are engaged in a discreet liaison with one of your Officers.]
translation: 心是无心的猎人。 [你和一名船官开始了一段谨慎的关系。]

original: Romance: Love in the Dark
translation: 浪漫: 黑暗中的爱情

original: You have engaged in a liaison with one of your officers, out at zee.
translation: 你和一名船官开始了一段关系, 在海泽之上。

original: Romance: Someone Back Home
translation: 浪漫: 有些人回家了

original: You chose a sweetheart in Fallen London.
translation: 你选择了伦敦的爱人.

original: Romantic Literature
translation: 爱情小说

original: All the adventures of the heart are here, in prose, poetry or pictorial form. Some may be more suitable for private consumption. [Note: in London, customs duty is paid on love stories. Even illustrated love stories.]
translation: 所有心的历险都在这里, 用散文,诗歌或者绘画。 有些也许更适合私人享用。 [附注:在伦敦, 所有的爱情故事都要缴税。即使是虚构的爱情故事也一样。]

original: Rosegate: The Bitter Flavour
translation: 玫瑰之门: 苦口之味

original: To ignite the mind.
translation: 用来点燃心智.

original: Rosegate: The Dogged Apprentice
translation: 玫瑰之门: 顽固的学徒

original: His master went far in pursuit of a cigar.
translation: 他的主人远行至此寻找烟草。

original: Rosegate: The Fate of a Cigar
translation: 玫瑰之门: 烟草的命运

original: Everyone has a dream.
translation: 每人都有个梦.

original: Rosegate: The Final Flavour
translation: 玫瑰之门: 最后的味道

original: A cigar is nothing without its wrapper.
translation: 如果不包装怎么能叫雪茄。

original: Rosegate: The Luscious Flavour
translation: 玫瑰之门: 甘美之味

original: To burn.
translation: 燃烧.

original: Rosegate: The Robust Flavour
translation: 玫瑰之门: 强健之味

original: To sustain.
translation: 支撑。

original: Rosegate: The Tobacconist's Impatience
translation: 玫瑰之门: 烟草匠减退的耐心

original: Every second of every minute; hour; day; week; month; year; is an agony to him.
translation: 每分每秒, 每日每周, 每月, 每年 对他而言都是痛苦。

original: Royal-Blue Feather
translation: 宝蓝色羽毛

original: Light as a thought, and jewel-bright
translation: 发出思想的光,像珠宝一样的光

original: Ruby Writing
translation: 红宝石色的写作

original: The Gnomic Gallivant is on a mission. "The board will forever alter," he says.
translation: 好说格言的寻乐者有个任务. "上面会永远改变," 他说.

original: Rumours of the Pirate-Poet
translation: 关于海盗诗人的流言

original: The pirates of Gaider's Mourn tell many tales of this clay corsair.
translation: 加德的哀悼那边的海盗告诉了你许多关于那个粘土海匪的故事。

original: Sack of Darkdrop Coffee Beans
translation: 一包暗涌咖啡豆

original: All the fire of Hell, and all the aroma of Heaven.
translation: 所有的地狱之火, 还有所有的天堂之馨.

original: Sacks and Snow: A Chill Presence
translation: 麻袋和雪: 刺骨寒冷的存在

original: How much of yourself can you give before there is nothing left to take?
translation: 在没东西可供拿取之前, 你能提供多少?

original: Sacks and Snow: Heart of Snow
translation: 麻袋和雪: 雪之心

original: It is in its nature to melt.
translation: 融化是它的本质。

original: Sacks and Snow: In the Service of Mr Sacks
translation: 麻袋和雪: 为麻袋先生服务

original: Take too much time and he may take you.
translation: 花了太长时间, 他可能会带上你。

original: Sacks and Snow: The Snow Child's Name
translation: 麻袋和雪: 雪孩子的名字

original: Sacks and Snow: What Snow May Become
translation: 麻袋和雪: 雪会变成什么

original: A child of snow was born at the Avid Horizon.
translation: 雪孩子生于渴求之地平线.

original: Salvaging a wreck
translation: 打捞沉船

original: Saviour's Rocks: At the Festival of Silk
translation: 救世主岩礁: 在丝物盛会上

original: It only lasts so long...
translation: 它只能持续这么长时间。。。

original: Saviour's Rocks: Avaricious Lorn-Fluke's Will
translation: 救世主岩礁: 贪婪的锚爪海胆的愿望

original: If you're lucky, it will only kill you.
translation: 如果你足够幸运,它只会杀了你。

original: Saviour's Rocks: Caught in the webs of Saviour's Rocks
translation: 救世主岩礁: 被救世主岩礁的蛛网困住

original: You have encountered the grand spider-council of Saviour's Rocks.
translation: 你遭遇了救世主岩礁的大蜘蛛议会。

original: Saviour's Rocks: Nocturne Integrity
translation: 救世主岩礁: 完整的夜曲号

original: She's not ready for a fight like this!
translation: 她还没为这样的一场战斗做好准备!

original: Saviour's Rocks: RC_SR_ShowCheats
Saviour's Rocks: Spying on the Sorrow Spiders
translation: 救世主岩礁: 刺探悲伤蜘蛛

original: They are always watching. So are you.
translation: 它们一直在看着. 你也是.

original: Saviour's Rocks: The Fate of the Nocturne
translation: 救世主岩礁: 夜曲号的命运

original: Every ship has its secrets.
translation: 每艘船都有自己的秘密。

original: Saviour's Rocks: The Festival of Silk
translation: 救世主岩礁: 丝物盛会

original: Saviour's Rocks gives thanks to its generous neighbours
translation: 救世主岩礁正在感谢那些慷慨的邻居

original: Saviour's Rocks: The Final Voyage of the Nocturne
translation: 救世主岩礁: 夜曲号的最后一次航行

original: She's falling apart, but at least she doesn't have far too go.
translation: 她正在瓦解, 但是至少她离终点不远了。

original: Saviour's Rocks: Trinkets. Just Trinkets.
translation: 救世主岩礁: 小玩意. 只是些小玩意.

original: Definitely not sorrow-spider eggs. Deliver them to Fallen London.
translation: 绝对不是悲伤蜘蛛的卵。把它们送到伦敦去。

original: Saviour's Rocks: Walk Into My Parlour, Said...
translation: 救世主岩礁: 进我的会客厅, 说。。。

original: Waiting for an audience with the spider-council of Saviour's Rocks.
translation: 和救世主岩礁的蜘蛛议会一起等待听众。

original: Scintillack
translation: 闪晶

original: Coral that glimmers as if moonlit. It makes marvellous jewellery or terribly expensive tea.
translation: 发出月光一样微光的珊瑚。它可以成为非常棒的珠宝或者极其昂贵的茶。

original: Scion
translation: 继承者

original: Your line will continue. [You have established a dynasty of zee-captains. This will persist between captains, unless something happens to end it.]
translation: 你的航行将会继续。 [你建立了一个船长的朝代。 这将会在船长之间流传, 除非有些事情发生并终止了它。]

original: Scrimshander: A Lost Pilgrim
translation: 骨雕馆: 迷失的朝圣之旅

original: She had a reason for coming to Scrimshander. And she has a reason for travelling to the Gant Pole. She's almost sure of it.
translation: 她有要去骨雕馆的理由. 她也有个理由要去刚特极点. 她几乎已经下定了决心.

original: Scrimshander: A Monastic Drownie
translation: 骨雕馆: 修道的溺亡者

original: A quiet drownie borne for Scrimshander, to dedicate his life to research.
translation: 为骨雕馆而生的沉默溺亡者, 要将生命献给研究。

original: Scrimshander: A Scholar of Histories
translation: 骨雕馆: 全史学者

original: Don't say "history" as if there's merely one of them.
translation: 不要说得好像这里只有一段历史那样.

original: Scrimshander: A Scholar of Lost Causes
translation: 骨雕馆: 消逝史学者

original: He's seen what people have fought and died for. Now he seeks the ones who survived at Hideaway.
translation: 他见人们战斗过, 见人们为自己的目标献身。 现在, 他正在找一名隐逸之地的幸存者。

original: Scrimshander: A Truth-Hunting Chelonate
translation: 骨雕馆: 狩猎真理的切洛内特人

original: An aging hunter borne for Scrimshander, searching for the great tales of her ancestors.
translation: 一名年老的猎人来到了骨雕馆, 寻找她祖先的伟大故事。

original: Scrimshander: Delivering a Cargo of Answers
translation: 骨雕馆: 递送答案货物

original: You have recovered a box of bone carvings from a wreck. The cargo was intended for delivery to Scrimshander.
translation: 你从残骸中找回了一箱骨雕。 那货物本来是要送去骨雕馆的。

original: Scrimshander: History of Heroes
translation: 骨雕馆: 关于英雄的历史

original: The Chelonate hunters believe history is the result of heroic words and deeds. A wise historian learns from their actions and embraces their heroism.
translation: 切洛内特的猎人们相信历史是英雄故事的结局。 一名明智的史学家从他们的行动中得到了启示并皈依了他们的英雄行为。

original: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Context of Change
translation: 骨雕馆: 幽暗储藏库: 变化的环境

original: Heroes come and go, cast up by turbulent times and washed away by the next tide. The Drownie Chorus in Scrimshaw's amphitheatre will pay you handsomely to uncover these patterns from the tales in the Ivory Archives.
translation: 英雄来来去去, 但是他们的故事被混乱的年代淹没, 被潮水冲刷。 骨雕大厅的溺亡者会向你支付大量报酬来换取幽暗储藏库中特别的故事。

original: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Delving into the Past
translation: 骨雕馆: 幽暗储藏库: 探寻过去

original: They say the Ivory Archives contains stories going back to the start of history. But they aren't very clear on when that was.
translation: 据说幽暗储藏库中有些东西能追溯到历史的开端. 但是没人知道那到底是什么.

original: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Historical Revelations
translation: 骨雕馆: 幽暗储藏库: 历史的启示

original: Found something interesting in the Ivory Archives, have you?
translation: 在幽暗储藏库里找到有意思的东西了, 不是吗?

original: Scrimshander: Ivory Archives: Searching for a Hero
translation: 骨雕馆: 幽暗储藏库: 寻找医生

original: The Chelonate's champions want to put on a play about a great hero. Find them source material in the archives and they'll give you a hero's reward. But a proper one, not an ironically tragic one that they get in the stories.
translation: 切洛内特的大战士想要演一出关于伟大英雄的戏剧。 在档案馆中找到材料, 然后他们会给你一个英雄的奖励。 不是暗讽他们戏剧中的那些故事。

original: Scrimshander: Missing Finger
translation: 骨雕馆: 失去的手指

original: One or more of your finger-bones tells your tale in the ivory walls of Scrimshander. Nothing a stuffed glove can't conceal.
translation: 一根或多根你的指骨都能从骨雕馆白骨墙上换取故事。 至于你的手。。。没什么是一双填了料的手套掩饰不了的。

original: Scrimshander: Tides of Time
translation: 骨雕馆: 时间之潮

original: Drownie scholars believe that history is a never-ending cycle of trends and social forces. A wise historian learns to sail each era's turbulent tides.
translation: 溺亡者学者相信历史是个永不停歇的回环。 明智的学者可以从每个时代的潮水中得到启示。

original: Scrimshander: Time in the Archives
translation: 骨雕馆: 档案馆中的时间

original: The Ivory Archives are jealously guarded. Like most of the figures in the archives, anyone overstaying their welcome is likely to meet a grisly end.
translation: 幽暗储藏库被小心翼翼地保护着。 就像大多数在档案馆中的人一样, 任何逗留时间超过受欢迎程度的人都有可能惨遭不幸。

original: Scrimshaw Chronicler
translation: 骨雕记录者

original: The Chronicler's heart is weary, but his meals are hearty... and he can make soup out of almost anything.
translation: 骨雕记录者的心已经很疲惫, 但是他的食物十分丰盛。。。 他几乎会用一切东西煲汤。

original: Seal of the Red Science
translation: 红科技的封印

original: A sky-scarred hunk of meteoric iron, the size of a wheel-barrow. Burning glyphs mark its flanks.
translation: 一块从天而降伤痕累累的陨铁, 有一辆独轮车那么大.它的两侧有发光的符文.

original: Searing Enigma
translation: 炽热的谜团

original: Mysteries are fire. Truth burns.
translation: 秘密就是火焰。 真理会燃烧。

original: Secret
translation: 秘密

original: The root of all good. [Discuss Secrets with your Officers to improve your skills. You can speak to your Officers by right-clicking their portraits.]
translation: 所有好事的根源。 [和你的船官讨论秘密来提升技能。 你可以通过右键点击他们的头像来和他们交谈。]

original: Secure Compartment
translation: 安全货柜

original: Ensure that no-one gets in without the key. In... or out.[This will help protect against acquisitive passengers and over-lively cargo.]
translation: 确保没人能在没有钥匙的情况下进去。。。或者出来。[这能防止你的货物被贪婪的乘客偷走,或者让你安全的运输一些活东西。]

original: Serene Aquarium
translation: 平静的水族箱

original: Look how it glides. Like moonlight.
translation: 看着它如何在水中滑行。 就像月光一样。

original: Shady Cook
translation: 阴暗的厨师

original: He can render the supplies edible, if not palatable.
translation: 他能让这些补给可以入口, 尽管不是很美味。

original: Shining Knight
translation: 闪耀的骑士

original: A kind of glory.
translation: 某种荣誉.

original: Ship Weight
translation: 船重

original: Shrine to Stone
translation: 石神的神龛

original: A glittering altar carved with the Signs of the South.
translation: 一个雕刻着南方的印记的神龛,闪闪发光。

original: Sigil-Eaten Navigator
translation: 吞噬符文的领航员

original: More Sigil than man, now. But he sets a true course.
translation: 和人类相比他更像是纯粹的符文。但是他能把你带向正确的方向。

original: Sigil-Ridden Navigator
translation: 浑身符文的领航员

original: Has that tattoo grown since last you looked?
translation: 那个纹身在你上次看到他之后又变大了?

original: Sly Navigator
translation: 狡猾的领航员

original: Competent? Probably. Trustworthy? Possibly.
translation: 胜任? 也许. 可靠? 没准.

original: Smith's Anguish
translation: 铁匠的苦恼

original: A monstrous weapon of monstrous heartmetal.
translation: 一件古怪的心金属武器。

original: Soft Glim-Lamp
translation: 柔和的灯晶灯

original: A Miraculous New Process Enables Passage Through Eternal Night! Do Not Consume.  [An adequate device for seeking enemies.]
translation: 不可思议的新技术能带你穿越冥河! 不要熄灭它。  [一件能胜任搜寻敌人任务的设备。]

original: Solacefruit
translation: 慰藉之果

original: In smaller quantities, delightful and refreshing. In larger quantities, one of the very nicest ways to die.
translation: 只要一两个,就能让你开心与振奋。但是吃得太多有可能让你体验到世间最美妙的死法。

original: Something Awaits You
translation: 有什么事情在等着你

original: You'll find a story when you next make port. [You'll receive this from time to time as you travel the zee.]
translation: 你下次停泊时会找到些新的故事. [当你在海上航行足够的时间后会得到这个.]

original: Soothe & Cooper Long-Box
translation: 苏瑟&库珀 长箱

original: On first sight, it looks like a tomb-colonist coffin. On closer examination, it carries stencilling reading SOOTHE & COOPER and a handwritten tag: 'DELIVERY TO DEPOT (A), STATION III'.
translation: 第一眼看上去,它就像是死亡侨民的棺材。 经过仔细检查, 它上面的铭牌上写着苏瑟 & 库珀 还有如下的标签: '遞送到 倉庫 (A), 3号要塞'。

original: Speculative Consonator
translation: 不确定性调谐器

original: Speculative Consonance: less than a technique, more than just a theory. [The Consonator does not limit your ability to hide.]
translation: 不确定性调谐: 相比于技术,更多的只是理论。 [调谐器不影响你隐匿的能力。]

original: Sphinxstone
translation: 斯芬克斯石

original: The Unmakers have smashed these sad and rubbly remnants off the flanks of a Salt Lion. A contact in London will purchase them.
translation: 那些破坏者已经把这些破碎而伤心的石材从盐狮的两翼撬了下来。一名伦敦的联络员会交易这些。

original: Stampshod's 'Calvary' Prong Launcher
translation: 斯坦霍德 '圣十字' 鱼叉发射器

original: "AN INESCAPABLE ENDING!" A potent weapon which permits Flensing attacks.
translation: "無法逃避的結局!" 一件发射鱼叉的强力武器.

original: Star-Shell
translation: 星壳

original: Did a Judgement hatch from this grim relic? Or was it something else entirely. Don't look too closely at the eye-hurting absence of colour.
translation: 司命是从这冰冷的残骸中孵化出来的吗?或者这完全是另一种东西。不要太凑近看这些伤眼的遗失颜色。

original: Station III: Acquainted with a Heartmetal Smith
translation: 3号要塞: 结识心金属铁匠

original: Your work for the Austere Acolyte has introduced you to others on the Island.
translation: 你为朴素的助手做的工作向你介绍了三号要塞里的其他人.

original: Station III: Earning the Acolyte's Favour
translation: 3号要塞: 赢得助手的好感

original: Your acquaintance with the Austere Acolyte.
translation: 你结识了朴素的助手。

original: Station III: Heartmetal Ingot
translation: 3号要塞: 心金属锭

original: An ingot of silvery metal, dreadfully cold to the touch.
translation: 一块银色金属锭, 摸起来极其寒冷。

original: Station III: Trading in Long Boxes
translation: 3号要塞: 交易长箱

original: Involvement in a certain trade.
translation: 参与到特定的交易中.

original: Sticks of Dynamite
translation: 炸药

original: A tool for pragmatic archeologists.
translation: 实用主义考古学家的工具。

original: Strange Catch
translation: 奇怪的猎获

original: It might be some sort of fish, but best not to look too closely.
translation: 它有可能是某种鱼,但是最好不要离太近看。

original: Strategic Information
translation: 战略情报

original: My. The Admiralty will certainly want to know this.
translation: 我的天. 将军绝对很想知道这个.

original: Stygian Ivory
translation: 阴暗黑骨

original: The black bones of zee-monsters make for startling corsets.
translation: 这些黑色的海怪骨头可以制作出令人惊讶的束胸衣。

original: Stymphalos-class Steam Launch
translation: 斯提姆法洛斯级小汽艇

original: Possibly there's a reason you might want to set to zee in a boat the size of a dining-room table. Possibly.
translation: 也许你想用餐桌大小的小船在海泽中航行是有原因的。

original: Sunlight-Filled Mirrorcatch Box
translation: 充满阳光的捕光镜匣

original: It's very dangerous, but who cares when it's so pretty?
translation: 它非常危险, 但是既然它如此美丽,又有谁在乎呢?

original: Supplies
translation: 补给

original: Food and equipment. [If you run out of supplies, Hunger will eventually destroy you.]
translation: 食物和工具。 [如果你耗尽了补给, 饥饿最终会毁掉你。]

original: Supplies for the Work
translation: 工作补给

original: Lenses, tinctures, candles, flammable oils. Now and then, bones.
translation: 透镜, 药酒, 蜡烛, 火油.偶尔, 需要骨头.

original: Suppression
translation: 抑制器

original: Ensures your ship's engine won't explode at Full Power.
translation: 确保发动机不会在开足马力时爆炸。

original: Supremacy: Affairs in Port Carnelian
translation: 霸权: 玛瑙港事务

original: Who rules London's first Unterzee colony?
translation: 谁统治着沦敦的第一个地下海殖民地?

original: Supremacy: London
translation: 霸权: 伦敦

original: God bless Her Enduring Majesty, the Empress.
translation: 上帝保佑不朽的女王陛下.

original: Supremacy: The Anarchists
translation: 霸权: 无政府主义者

original: LO THY DREAD EMPIRE CHAOS IS RESTORED LIGHT DIES BEFORE THY UNCREATING WORD
translation: 看 你那可怕的帝國 混亂已經歸來 光明跪倒 被你毀滅的言辭屠戮 譯註:原文出自 亚历山大 · 蒲柏的群愚史诗(Alexander Pope's Dunciad)

original: Supremacy: The Dawn Machine
translation: 霸权: 黎明机器

original: UN. THE SUN. THE SUN. THE SUN. THE S
translation: 陽。 太陽。 太陽。 太陽。 太。。。

original: Supremacy: The Khanate
translation: 霸权: 汗国

original: The Khanate's power is growing.
translation: 汗国的势力正在增长。

original: Supremacy: the Lorn-Flukes
translation: 霸權: 孤独的海胆

original: Patience; rage; patience.
translation: 耐心; 狂暴; 耐心。

original: Surgeon
translation: 医生

original: Surveyed: Abbey Rock
translation: 调查: 修道院岩礁

original: The nuns endure.
translation: 修女们忍耐着.

original: Surveyed: Adam's Way
translation: 调查: 亚当之路

original: You've seen the blood that flows from the Continent's heart.
translation: 你已经见到了古大陆的心流出的血液之河。

original: Surveyed: Aestival
translation: 调查: 阿斯蒂沃

original: You've seen where the sunlight brushes the zee.
translation: 你已经见到了海泽中那被光明洗礼过的地方。

original: Surveyed: Aigul
translation: 调查: 爱古

original: You've visited the Fortas Kettle.
translation: 你已游览过Fortas Kettle.

original: Surveyed: Anthe
translation: 调查: 安忒

original: Have you turned in a Port Report of Anthe?
translation: 你变成安忒的港口报告了吗?

original: Surveyed: Avid Horizon
translation: 调查: 渴求之地平线

original: You have seen where the world ends. Behind those peaks of ice, something colder by far.
translation: 你已经看到了世界的尽头。 在那些冰山的后面, 有些更冷的东西。

original: Surveyed: Chapel of Lights
translation: 调查: 光之礼拜堂

original: You have seen where the Service of the Well is performed.
translation: 你已经见到了那些人是如何服侍古井的。

original: Surveyed: Codex
translation: 调查: 法典岛

original: A caveful of exiles.
translation: 山洞里住满了流亡者.

original: Surveyed: Dahut
translation: 调查: 达哈

original: You have explored Dahut.
translation: 你已经探索了达哈。

original: Surveyed: Demeaux Island
translation: 调查: 德莫岛

original: You have seen the place where they have more mushrooms than sense.
translation: 你已经见到了那个蘑菇看上去比表面多得多的地方。

original: Surveyed: Empire of Hands
translation: 调查: 手掌帝国

original: You have returned from the land of soul-stealing monkeys.
translation: 你从偷灵魂的猴子的领地回来了.

original: Surveyed: Frostfound
translation: 调查: 寒霜城

original: You have met the squatters at the tower of zee ice.
translation: 你已经见过了海冰之塔下那些蹲着的人。

original: Surveyed: Gaider's Mourn
translation: 调查: 加德的哀悼

original: You have seen the lights and the cliffs.
translation: 你已经见过了那里的灯光和悬崖.

original: Surveyed: Godfall
translation: 调查: 神落

original: You have seen the shattered citadel that lies in the zee.
translation: 你已经见过了倒在海中的破碎城堡。

original: Surveyed: Grand Geode
translation: 调查: 宏伟晶洞

original: You've seen the house of the elect of the Dawn Machine.
translation: 你已经见过了那些被黎明机器选中的人。

original: Surveyed: Hideaway
translation: 调查: 隐逸之地

original: You've made friends with Temtum.
translation: 你和坦途做了朋友.

original: Surveyed: Hunter's Keep
translation: 调查: 猎户塔楼

original: An odd place. Best to keep an eye on it.
translation: 一处奇怪的地方，最好留意一下。

original: Surveyed: Irem
translation: 调查: 伊瑞暮

original: You will return from Irem.
translation: 你将从伊瑞暮归来。

original: Surveyed: Isle of Cats
translation: 调查: 猫岛

original: You have seen the Pirate-King's domain.
translation: 你已经见过了海盗王的领地。

original: Surveyed: Khan's Heart
translation: 调查: 可汗之心

original: You've been to Khan's Heart, where the electric lights glow and the clans sharpen their claws.
translation: 你已经去过了可汗之心, 那里的电灯很亮,几大部族都在磨砺他们的利爪。

original: Surveyed: Khan's Shadow
translation: 调查: 可汗之影

original: You've seen where the Khanate rebels lair.
translation: 你已经见到了汗国叛军的巢穴在哪。

original: Surveyed: Kingeater's Castle
translation: 调查: 噬王者的城堡

original: You've seen the hungry place at the world's edge.
translation: 你已经见过了世界边缘的饥渴之地。

original: Surveyed: Low Barnet
translation: 调查: 沉没的巴内特

original: You have explored Low Barnet.
translation: 你已经探索了沉没的巴内特.

original: Surveyed: Mt Palmerston
translation: 调查: 帕默斯顿山

original: A detailed report on a place of interest. The Admiralty would value it.
translation: 一份关于名胜古迹的详细报告。海军部会很重视的。

original: Surveyed: Nook
translation: 调查: 旮旯

original: You've been to the great Maw.
translation: 你已经去过了巨大大嘴.

original: Surveyed: Nuncio
translation: 调查: 农西奥

original: You've seen the Island of Lost Postmen.
translation: 你已经见过了遗失邮差们的岛屿。

original: Surveyed: Pigmote Isle
translation: 调查: 皮格莫特岛

original: You have seen first-hand the Rodent War.
translation: 你得到了啮齿类动物战争的第一手资料。

original: Surveyed: Polythreme
translation: 调查: 碎心国

original: You have seen the city where the Clay Men are made for labour.
translation: 你已经见到了产出做劳工的粘土人的城市。

original: Surveyed: Port Carnelian
translation: 调查: 玛瑙港

original: Information on Little London for Fallen London.
translation: 把小伦敦消息带给伦敦.

original: Surveyed: Port Cecil
translation: 调查: 塞西尔港

original: You have seen the place where chess is holy.
translation: 你已经见到了那个视象棋为圣物的地方。

original: Surveyed: Quaker's Haven
translation: 调查: 贵格避风港

original: You have seen the hill where the fire is kept.
translation: 你已经见过了保管火焰的山岗.

original: Surveyed: Rosegate
translation: 调查: 玫瑰之门

original: A place of handmade delights, all available for a price.
translation: 手工制作愉悦的地方, 所有的东西都有价可循。

original: Surveyed: Saviour's Rocks
translation: 调查: 救世主岩礁

original: You survived a trip to the lair of the sorrow-spiders.
translation: 你从去悲伤蜘蛛躲藏地的旅途中活了下来.

original: Surveyed: Scrimshander
translation: 调查: 骨雕馆

original: You've been to the City of Remembrance and left something of yourself behind.
translation: 你去过了一个记忆之城, 并将自己的一部分抛在了身后。

original: Surveyed: Shepherd Isles
translation: 调查: 牧羊人岛

original: You can confirm, at least, that they are where they are.
translation: 至少你可以确认,  他们就在他们现在所说的地方.

original: Surveyed: Station III
translation: 调查: 3号要塞

original: On the very edge of London's influence, curious matters are conducted.
translation: 在伦敦影响力的边缘,一些奇怪的事情发生了。

original: Surveyed: the Chelonate
translation: 调查: 切洛内特

original: You've seen the floating corpse of the Turtle.
translation: 你已经见过了巨龟的漂浮残骸.

original: Surveyed: the Fathomking's Hold
translation: 调查: 深寻王的城堡

original: You've seen what grows around the Fathomking's throne.
translation: 你已经见到了深寻王王座附近的东西。

original: Surveyed: The Gant Pole
translation: 调查: 刚特极点

original: You've been where the beasts of the zee go to die.
translation: 你已经去过了海中巨兽走向死亡的地方。

original: Surveyed: the Mangrove College
translation: 调查: 红树学院

original: All foison, all abundance.
translation: 所有的都很丰裕,所有的都很充实.

original: Surveyed: the Salt Lions
translation: 调查: 盐狮

original: You've seen what happens when one digs too deep for secrets.
translation: 你已经见到了一个人挖掘秘密太深会发生什么。

original: Surveyed: the Uttershroom
translation: 调查: 世纪之蕈

original: You've been to the Mother of Fungus.
translation: 你见到了真菌之母.

original: Surveyed: Undercrow
translation: 调查: 爪下

original: You have found the secluded home of moths and mourning.
translation: 你已经找到了蛾子和哀痛的隐秘巢穴。

original: Surveyed: Varchas
translation: 调查: 瓦尔查斯

original: There are dark machinations in the walled city of light.
translation: 这座围墙中的光明之城中酝酿着黑暗的阴谋。

original: Surveyed: Venderbight
translation: 调查: 文登湾

original: You have seen the place where the half-dead go.
translation: 你已经见到了这些半死的人会去的地方.

original: Surveyed: Visage
translation: 调查: 维瑟吉

original: You have seen the isle where one face only is permitted.
translation: 你已经见到了只允许一张面孔存在的岛屿。

original: Surveyed: Whither
translation: 调查: 何方

original: You have seen the ice and salt.
translation: 你已经见过了那里的冰和盐.

original: Surveyed: Wisdom
translation: 调查: 智慧监狱

original: Both secrets and prisoners are locked here.
translation: 秘密和囚犯都被囚禁在其中。

original: Surveyed: Wrack
translation: 调查: 船墟

original: You have seen the home of sundered hulls.
translation: 你已经见到了破碎船壳的家.

original: Tale of Terror!!
translation: 恐怖故事!!

original: Recall it, then light a candle. Light another.
translation: 回忆它,然后点燃一支蜡烛。 再照亮另一个。

original: Terror
translation: 恐惧

original: The fear of the wide black zee, and the things beyond. [Reduce this with Shore Leave, especially in London. When you return to London after time at zee, your Terror will always drop to 50.]
translation: 对辽阔而黑暗的海泽的恐惧, 还有那些更深的东西。 [用上岸的方式降低恐惧, 尤其是在伦敦。 如果当你回到伦敦时恐惧高于50, 你的恐惧值会下降到50。]

original: The Boke of Sharpes
translation: 恶徒之书

original: This barely qualifies as a book. Dozens of scraps of paper have been crammed into a scuffed folio. Each bears helpful advice on murder, and, often, a stain.
translation: 这几乎不能称得上是一本书。 几打纸片塞进另外两张纸片。 每张上面都印着一条对针对谋杀的有用建议, 还有, 一些血迹。

original: The Cladery Heart
translation: 覆叶之心

original: It thrums. It wanders. It has a delightful stink. [This ship is available players who backed Sunless Sea at the Navigator Tier or higher. It will become available as DLC at a later date.]
translation: 它扑通扑通，飘来飘去，散发着令人愉悦的气味。 [这艘船玩家将在日后以更高的领航等级返回无光之海时可用。 它将在日后DLC中开放。]

original: The Cruelty of Sunlight
translation: 阳光的残酷行为

original: You are far from home.
translation: 你离家很远.

original: The Fate of Needles
translation: 棘刺的命运

original: It is rare something so awful washes up on shore.
translation: 这是能冲上岸的最可怕也最罕见的东西。

original: The Fate of the Pirate-Poet
translation: 海盗诗人的命运

original: Her verses may be complete.
translation: 她的诗或许结束了.

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Anthe
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 安忒

original: Does her husband survive at the City of Flowers?
translation: 她的丈夫去了花之城吗?

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Dahut
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 达哈

original: Did he seek the City of Peace?
translation: 他寻找过和平之城吗?

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Gant Pole
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 刚特极点

original: Perhaps he hides in the place where monsters go to die.
translation: 也许他藏在了海兽走向死亡的地方。

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Hideaway
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 隐逸之地

original: Did her husband retreat to the City of Refuge?
translation: 她的丈夫逃去了难民之城吗?

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Nook
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 旮旯

original: Did her husband flee to the City of Freedom?
translation: 她的丈夫逃去自由之城了吗?

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: on the Trail
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 追踪中

original: The Fierce Philanthropist: Scrimshander
translation: 暴躁的慈善家: 骨雕馆

original: Is her husband at the City of Remembrance?
translation: 她的丈夫在回忆之城吗?

original: The Figurehead of the Eater of Names
translation: 食名者的船首像

original: This weird skull once adorned the worm-drawn priest-barge of the Chelonate.
translation: 这个奇怪的骷髅曾经是切洛内特巨大蠕虫牵引的祭司战舰的船首装饰。

original: The Fulgent Impeller
translation: 辉煌涡轮机

original: "These are the forces that drive the Bazaar." The Impeller runs very, very hot.
translation: "这些就是驱动着巴扎的力量." 涡轮机运转着,发出巨量的热量.

original: The Gods of the Zee: Defiant
translation: 海泽的神: 蔑视

original: You don't care for gods, real or imagined. You'll make your own way. [This does not protect you from the curses of the zee-gods.]
translation: 你根本不关心这些神,无论是真实的还是虚构的。 你会走你自己的路。 [这不会让你免遭海泽诸神的诅咒。]

original: The Gods of the Zee: Salt's Attention
translation: 海泽之神: 盐神的注意

original: It's watching you; if it even exists.
translation: 它在看着你; 如果它真的存在.

original: The Gods of the Zee: Salt's Curse
translation: 海泽之神: 盐神的诅咒

original: A curse lies on you: the curse of the nameless god of farewells.
translation: 诅咒降临到你身上: 无名的告别之神的诅咒。

original: The Gods of the Zee: Stone, Storm and Salt
translation: 海泽之神: 石头, 风暴和盐

original: There are powers.
translation: 海泽中存在着一些强大的力量.

original: The Gods of the Zee: Stone's Attention
translation: 海泽之神: 石神的注意

original: It's very far away; but perhaps it's watching you.
translation: 它在很远的地方;但是也许它在注意着你。

original: The Gods of the Zee: Stone's Curse
translation: 海泽之神: 石的诅咒

original: You carry a curse: the curse of the nameless god of home and healing.
translation: 你带上了一个诅咒: 家与治愈的无名神的诅咒。

original: The Gods of the Zee: Storm's Attention
translation: 海泽之神: 风暴神的注意

original: An ancient anger knows you.
translation: 古代的愤怒现在知道了你的存在.

original: The Gods of the Zee: Storm's Curse
translation: 海泽之神: 风暴神的诅咒

original: A curse lies on you: the curse of the nameless god of high places and anger.
translation: 诅咒降临到你身上: 高处与愤怒的无名神的诅咒。

original: The Heart of the Tree of Ages
translation: 世纪之树的心

original: The oldest and deadliest arachnid from its chitinous core. Deadliest, and now thankfully dead.
translation: 来自它甲壳质核心的最古老最致命的蜘蛛状生物。 最致命的,感谢上天它死了。

original: The Horizon Codex
translation: 地平线法典

original: "Herein are recorded certain details of a Voyage through [xxxxx] in the company of [xxxxxx], on [xxxxxx]...." [Use this to increase your Pages. Unless you sell it, future captains will have access to it.]
translation: "这里记录了一些穿越[xxxxx] 的细节,在[xxxxxx]的陪伴执行, 在 [xxxxxx]上。。。。" [用这个提高你的交流值。未来的船长可以一直使用它除非你将它卖掉。]

original: The Lady in Lilac
translation: 紫丁香色的女士

original: Now where exactly did you meet, again? Did Clathermont the tattooist introduce you?
translation: 你们究竟是在哪里遇到的, 又一次?是纹身师克拉瑟莫特介绍你们认识的吗?

original: The Last Constable: Demeaux Island
translation: 最后的治安官: 德莫岛

original: Has she found a hiding space amongst the spores?
translation: 她在孢子中找到了一个藏身地吗?

original: The Last Constable: Gaider's Mourn
translation: 最后的治安官: 加德的哀悼

original: Is she bringing justice to the pirates of Corsair's Forest?
translation: 她将正义带给了海盗之林的海盗们吗?

original: The Last Constable: Khan's Heart
translation: 最后的治安官: 可汗之心

original: Could she be hiding out at London's rival?
translation: 她会藏在伦敦的敌国吗?

original: The Last Constable: On The Trail
translation: 最后的治安官: 寻找中

original: You seek her here, you seek her there.
translation: 你在这里找她, 你在那里找她.

original: The Last Constable: Venderbight
translation: 最后的治安官: 文登湾

original: Is she working amongst the nearly-dead?
translation: 她在这些半死不活的人之中工作吗?

original: The Mark of the East
translation: 东方的印记

original: Old soul. Where are you going, old soul?
translation: 苍老的灵魂啊。 你要去哪里, 苍老的灵魂?

original: The Mechanic's Secret
translation: 机械师的秘密

original: This is the design he stored in Frostfound.
translation: 这就是他存放在寒霜城的设计图。

original: The Merciless Modiste
translation: 无情的衣帽商

original: She has no difficulties with blood. But she very much dislikes bloodstains.
translation: 她对见血表示无所谓。 但是她非常不喜欢衣服上的血污。

original: The Merciless Modiste's Heart
translation: 无情衣帽商的心

original: It's not an attractive object. Perhaps you won't keep it on your mantelpiece.
translation: 它不是个有吸引力的东西。 也许你不会把它留在壁炉架上。

original: THE NEATHBOW
translation: 地虹

original: A book for children. One page is devoted to each of the colours of the Neath, which are not found on the Surface.\n\n[Return to the Curator with each of the seven impossible colours in hand. The book's pages give you clues, but you'll need to seek far ports.]
translation: 一本为孩子写的书。 每一页上都是一种地表无法找到但是却存在于地下的颜色。\n\n[你每找到一种不可能的颜色都可以返回到监护官这里。 书页给了你一些线索, 但是你需要在远方的港口找到它们。]

original: The Pirate-Poet
translation: 海盗诗人

original: Legend. Enigma. She has an appointment in Polythreme.
translation: 传奇  谜团. 在碎心国有个位置等着她.

original: The Prudent Magician
translation: 谨慎的魔术师

original: He has turned aside from his revenge.
translation: 他将他的复仇暂时搁置。

original: The respect of the Conodont
translation: 老鳗的尊重

original: The Satisfied Magician
translation: 满足的魔术师

original: He has the quiet smile of a man who has tamped down the earth on his enemy's grave.
translation: 他有着把敌人的墓土压实后的那种满意笑容。

original: The Scarred Sister
translation: 伤痕累累的妹妹

original: She was the youngest sister of the Hunter's Keep three. Now her home is gone. She will not show her face, nor speak of what occurred, but she is prepared to use her education to help heal your crew...
translation: 她是猎户塔楼的三姐妹中最年轻的。 现在她已无家可归。 她不会向你展示她的脸, 更不会说发生了什么,但是她已经准备好用她的知识治愈你的船员。。。

original: The Scars of the North
translation: 北方的伤痕

original: The place which is no-place held you, crushed you. You carry the wounds still.
translation: 无法容留你的地方, 压碎了你。 你身上依旧有伤势。

original: The Scholar's Notes
translation: 学者的笔记

original: Sealed with a ribbon. It looks like a ribbon, anyway.
translation: 用一根丝带封起. 总之那看起来像是一根丝带.

original: The Serpentine
translation: 蛇纹机

original: A shimmering complexus of steel and glass. In its heart, a serpent-king rages. Or so the Magician claims.
translation: 一个用玻璃和钢铁制造的复杂机器,闪着光。 在它的核心,一只蛇王怒吼着。 也许是魔术师在哀求着。

original: The Snow Child
translation: 雪孩子

original: Every day, it melts a little more.
translation: 每天它都会融化一点.

original: The Touch of the South
translation: 南方的碰触

original: The lights of the Elder Continent swim in your blood.
translation: 古大陆的光在你的血液中涌动。

original: The Urbane Magician
translation: 彬彬有礼的魔术师

original: Something silver looks out through his eyes.
translation: 有些银色的东西在他的眼中闪烁着。

original: The Western Stigma
translation: 西方的烙印

original: You have seen behind the Dawn Machine
translation: 你见到了黎明机器之后的东西

original: The Zong of the Zee
translation: 海泽之歌

original: For this, they will all remember you.
translation: 他们会因此记住你.

original: Time Remaining...
translation: 剩下的时间。。。

original: The clock is ticking!
translation: 时间正在流逝!

original: Tireless Mechanic
translation: 不知疲倦的机械师

original: Does he ever sleep? His eyes are dark-circled, but his hands are steady.
translation: 他从没睡过? 他的眼睛下有重重的黑眼圈, 但是他的手依旧很稳。

original: Tomb-Colonist
translation: 死亡侨民

original: Technically, passengers rather than goods. But you'd never know it to talk to them. [They'll pay their passage to the Tomb-Colonies: sell them there.]
translation: 技术上来讲他们是乘客而不是货物。 但是你永远不知道他们是否会说些什么。 [死亡聚居地会为这些乘客买单: 把他们在那里卖掉。]

original: Tooth of the Snow Child
translation: 雪孩子的牙齿

original: The Monkey Foundling must have dropped it.
translation: 一定是猴子遗孤丢掉的.

original: Torpedo Components
translation: 鱼雷

original: In one of the most striking coincidences of our times, torpedoes are 'torpedo-shaped'. [Ammunition for Torpedo Salvoes.]
translation: 我们这个时代最惊人的巧合, 鱼雷是 '鱼形'的。 [鱼雷射击需要的弹药。]

original: Torpedo Nets
translation: 鱼雷网

original: Deploy these in combat for unparalleled protection against torpedoes!
translation: 在战斗中部署鱼雷网能够很好的防御鱼雷的攻击!

original: Torpedo Protection
translation: 鱼雷防护

original: Deployed protection against torpedoes, expressed as %
translation: 部署了防御鱼雷的保护，表示为 %

original: Torpedo Tubes
translation: 鱼雷发射管

original: This determines the effectiveness of torpedo devices. It's only available from device enhancements.
translation: 这决定了鱼雷攻击的效率。这只在一些增强型设备上有。

original: Trophy: A Collection of Teeth
translation: 纪念品: 一些牙齿

original: Each one from a different mouth. [A previous captain in your lineage was a debased cannibal who served the Chapel of Lights and the Drowned Man]
translation: 每颗牙都是从不同的嘴里拔下来的. [你之前的那个船长是一名低贱的食人者,服务于光之礼拜堂和那个溺死的人]

original: Trophy: A Daguerreotype of a Memorial
translation: 纪念品: 作为纪念的银版相片

original: The image of an imposing memorial. The rain-blurred name is difficult to read. [A previous captain in your lineage found and buried their father's bones - or a substitute.]
translation: 很正式的纪念照。 被雨水浸湿的名字很难读出来。 [在你之前的那名船长找到并埋葬了他父亲的遗骨,或者遗骨的代替品。]

original: Trophy: a Family Bible
translation: 纪念品: 家庭圣经

original: King James' edition, of course. One passage is circled in old red ink - Romans 6:9. [A previous captain in your lineage once achieved immortality, or turned it down.]
translation: 当然是雅各书。 其中一段被红墨水圈了起来, 墨迹已经很久了 - 罗马书 6:9。 [你的前任船长之一实现了不朽, 或者推翻了不朽。]

original: Trophy: A Family Portrait
translation: 纪念品: 一张全家福

original: The resemblance is obvious. Both are smiling. [A previous captain in your lineage found and rescued their father.]
translation: 照片上的人有一个共同点。 他们都在微笑。 [你之前的那名船长找到并救出了他的父亲。]

original: Trophy: A Folded Flag
translation: 纪念品: 折叠的旗帜

original: An unusual flag from a tiny nation far across the zee.
translation: 一面从海泽远方的迷你国家来的不寻常的旗帜.

original: Trophy: A Letter of Commendation
translation: 纪念品: 一封嘉奖信

original: The Postmaster Cryptic herself signed this letter. [A previous captain in your lineage found bones in a misaddressed package.]
translation: 神秘的邮政局长亲自签署的这封信。 [你之前的船长在寄错的邮包中找到了骨头。]

original: Trophy: A Model Monster
translation: 纪念品: 典型的怪物

original: A zee-monster paperweight, beautifully carved from Stygian ivory. [A previous captain in your lineage proved to be the child of a zee-monster]
translation: 一个海怪镇纸, 用阴暗黑骨雕得很漂亮。 [你之前的船长被证明是海怪之子]

original: Trophy: A Posthumous Medal
translation: 纪念品: 死后的奖章

original: The Zociety of Zeafarers took up a collection to have this struck. [A previous captain in your lineage found that their father had sacrificed himself to save his crew.]
translation: 社会人士和海员为他进行了募捐。 [你之前的船长的父亲牺牲了自己来拯救他的船员。]

original: Trophy: A Shattered Coral Knife
translation: 纪念品: 一把破碎的珊瑚刀

original: The fragments are proudly displayed on a lacquered plaque. [A previous captain in your lineage found bones at Kingeater's Castle]
translation: 这些碎片被骄傲地展示在饰板上. [你之前的船长在噬王者的城堡里找到了遗骨]

original: Trophy: An Autographed Copy of the Zong of the Zee
translation: 纪念品: 海泽之歌的手稿

original: It's a first edition, too. [A captain of your lineage wrote the definitive work of maritime literature.]
translation: 这也是第一版。 [你之前的船长完成了一部关于海泽的史诗。]

original: Trophy: An Impossible Restaurant Bill
translation: 纪念品: 不可思议的餐厅账单

original: Tucked into a desk drawer is a restaurant bill with a triple-circled final total larger than the cost of most ships. [A captain of your lineage won riches and a comfortable retirement.]
translation: 书桌的抽屉里摞着这些餐厅的账单,加起来是一艘普通船只的价格的三倍。 [你之前的船长赢得了财富并在舒适中退休。]

original: Trophy: Not Quite Human
translation: 纪念品: 不完全是人类

original: Was this once someone? [A previous captain in your lineage discovered they were part zee-monster, and abandoned their human existence.]
translation: 这曾经是某人吗? [你之前的船长发现他海怪的那一面, 并且抛弃了他作为人类的存在。]

original: Trophy: Restless
translation: 纪念品: 没有尽头

original: A painting hangs in your study, of a wrought-iron buoy, endlessly afloat, light piercing in the Neath's dark. You can almost hear the bell. [A captain of your lineage sailed east out of the world.]
translation: 你的书房里挂着一幅画, 是一个熟铁打造的浮标, 永无尽头地漂浮着, 光线刺穿了海泽的黑暗。你几乎能听到那钟声。 [你之前的船长越过了世界的最东方。]

original: Trophy: the Lights of London
translation: 纪念品: 伦敦的灯火

original: A painting hangs in your study. Two travellers watch, forever, as the lights of their destination come closer. [A captain of your lineage sailed east out of the world.]
translation: 你的书房里挂着一幅画。 两名旅者在眺望着, 永远保持着这个姿势,就像他们目的地的光已经很近了。 [你之前的船长越过了世界的最东方。]

original: Trophy: Those Final Mountains
translation: 纪念品: 最终之山

original: A painting hangs in your study, of mist on the face of impossible mountains. [A captain of your lineage sailed east out of the world.]
translation: 你的书房里挂着一幅画, 看起来像是一座不可能存在的山上缠绕着的迷雾。 [你之前的船长越过了世界的最东方。]

original: Unclear Device
translation: 不明仪器

original: They make these on the roof-tops, and won't say why. [A one-use item that will remove all Illumination from both sides in combat, and increase Terror.]
translation: 他们在屋顶上制造了这些, 并且不会说为什么。 [一件一次性物品,在战斗中对双方产生无法照亮的黑暗, 增加恐惧。]

original: Uncovering Mysteries: An Infernal Fate
translation: 未被揭露的秘密: 地狱的命运

original: What awaits the Deviless, in the Brass Embassy?
translation: 什么在黄铜大使馆等待着女恶魔?

original: Uncovering Mysteries: the Shattered Citadel
translation: 未被揭露的秘密: 破碎的城堡

original: Depths are there for the plumbing. What did the Starved Men leave?
translation: 深处到处都是通道.那些饥饿的人留下了什么?

original: Under the Unterzee
translation: 海泽之下

original: You have access to the Zubmariner DLC expansion.
translation: 你已拥有 潜艇DLC。

original: Undercrow: Delivering a Farewell Letter to Hideaway
translation: 爪下: 向隐逸之地送一封告别信

original: A letter from the Almost Dead Man, bidding farewell to a lover in Hideaway.
translation: 来自一位几乎已死的人的信, 向隐逸之地的一位爱人告别。

original: Undercrow: Delivering a Letter
translation: 爪下: 送信

original: You have an important message to deliver. [Look at the letter in your inventory to see its destination.]
translation: 你要送一封重要的信。 [在物品栏中查看信件来确认目的地位置。]

original: Undercrow: Delivering a Letter of Apology to Nook
translation: 爪下: 向旮旯送一封道歉信

original: A letter from the Almost Dead Man, apologizing to a comrade in Nook.
translation: 来自一位几乎已死的人的信, 给旮旯的同志的道歉.

original: Undercrow: Delivering a Love Letter to Anthe
translation: 爪下: 向安忒送一封关于爱的信

original: A letter from the Almost Dead Man, professing his undying love to one in Anthe.
translation: 来自一位几乎已死的人的信, 向安忒的某人宣读其永恒的爱。

original: Undercrow: Dying Grace
translation: 爪下: 将死的优雅

original: How does an Almost Dead Man face his end?
translation: 这个几乎已死的人如何面对他的死亡?

original: Undercrow: Incomparable Aurelian
translation: 爪下: 举世无双的昆虫学者

original: An unsentimental man of pins and the jar, in pursuit of rare lepidopterae.
translation: 一位不动感情的人, 喜欢摆弄标本针和那些玻璃罐, 他正在寻找罕见的鳞翅目昆虫。

original: Undercrow: Lorenzo's Husk
translation: 爪下: 洛伦佐的外套

original: Not so much a corpse as a discarded morning-suit. Nonetheless, his brother at Port Demeaux will want to know.
translation: 与其说是尸体, 不如说是一件刚脱下的西装。 尽管如此, 他在德莫港的兄弟也许想知道。

original: Undercrow: The Almost Dead Man
translation: 爪下: 几乎已死的人

original: The Almost Dead Man hopes to end a complicated life with a clear conscience.
translation: 几乎死去的人希望问心无愧地结束这复杂的生命.

original: Unread Log
translation: 未经阅读的日志

original: Safer not to, eh?
translation: 最好不要读, 嗯?

original: Unsettling Sage
translation: 令人不安的贤者

original: He's always watching. He doesn't blink.
translation: 他一直在看着。他不会眨眼。

original: Unstamped Crate of Brilliant Souls
translation: 一箱未盖章的卓越灵魂

original: A crate of exceptional human souls. It has never known the tender touch of the Imperial Customs stamp. Consequently, it cannot be sold on the open market, and you'd better not be caught with it.
translation: 一箱特别的人类灵魂。 它永远也不会知道皇家海关的印章长什么样子。 因此, 它不能在市场中出售,你最好别在带着这些的时候被人抓到。

original: Unstamped Crate of Human Souls
translation: 一箱未盖章的灵魂

original: A crate of pleading souls. This one does not bear a customs stamp - it is contraband!
translation: 一箱正在哀求的灵魂. 它上面没有盖海关的印章 - 这是走私货!

original: Uttershroom Sporule
translation: 世纪之蕈的孢子

original: A fruit, a jewel, a tear? Leave that distinction to the botanists. It tastes a little like pine-nuts.
translation: 一个果实,一个珠宝,还是一滴眼泪? 让植物学家来鉴定它吧。它尝起来有点像松果。

original: Varchas: Directions from the Varchaasi Guard
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 瓦尔查斯的守卫为你指路

original: You know your way to the Hospital, the Guard-House and Mihir's temple.
translation: 你知道了去医院的路, 还有去警卫室和米希尔庙的.

original: Varchas: the Agnihotri's Interest
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 大司焰的兴趣

original: It's a good thing. Probably?
translation: 这可能是件好事?

original: Varchas: The Dour-Faced Nurse's Approval
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 表情严肃的护士的认可

original: It is hard-earned.
translation: 这很难得。

original: Varchas: The Jewel-Turbaned Youth's Invitation
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 戴镶宝石头巾年轻人的邀请

original: It seems innocuous enough; what's the worst that could happen?
translation: 这看起来并没有坏处; 最坏会发生什么?

original: Varchas: The Knells of the Towers
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 塔楼上的钟声

original: Varchas has five mirrored towers. When each has sounded its bell, it is evening.
translation: 瓦尔查斯有五座镜塔。 当每座塔都敲响过大钟后,夜幕就降临了。

original: Varchas: the Mirrored City
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 镜之城

original: They worship the sun in Varchas, and have banished darkness from the city.
translation: 他们崇拜瓦尔查斯的太阳, 并且已经把黑暗从城市中流放出去。

original: Varchas: the Respect of the Guard
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 守卫的尊重

original: Won in bruises and sweat
translation: 通过汗水与伤痕得到的尊重

original: Varchas: the Tardy Lamp-Lighter
translation: 瓦尔查斯: 迟缓的点灯者

original: The brother of the Keeper of the Western Principal Mirror; has a weakness for wine and dark-eyed boys.
translation: 西部主镜的管理者兄弟; 对黑眼的男孩和酒没有抵抗力.

original: Veils
translation: 面纱值

original: Speed, stealth, deception. Decreases the range at which enemies will spot you.
translation: 速度,隐藏,欺诈。 降低敌人能够发现你的距离。

original: Venturer's Medallion
translation: 冒险家的奖章

original: Black, and inscribed with curling symbols.
translation: 黑色的,雕刻着一些卷曲的记号。

original: Vial of Highly Questionable Blood
translation: 一瓶高度可疑的血

original: Red. As blood tends to be. But redder. Deeper. Alive.
translation: 红色的。 像血该有的颜色。 但是更红, 更深, 还活着。

original: Vials of Red Honey
translation: 一小瓶红蜂蜜

original: Ten marked vials packed in a carefully padded casket. [This stuff is too dangerous even to be properly illegal. Be cautious in taking it to London.]
translation: 每一个仔细填满垫料的箱子里都装了十瓶。 [这东西就算是合法使用也太过危险。 把它带到伦敦时要格外小心。]

original: Vigilant Idol
translation: 警醒的雕像

original: Set it on your binnacle,  feed it the blood of zee-bats. It will guide you.
translation: 把它放到你的罗盘上,  用海蝙蝠的血喂它. 它会指引你的.

original: Visage: Expertise in Parts
translation: 维瑟吉: 一部分所需的知识

original: A knowledge of roles and how they are to be played. [Sometimes, ignorance is freedom. Learning more will have complex effects.]
translation: 一些关于如何扮演这些角色的知识。 [有时候, 无知即是自由。 学到更多会造成更复杂的效应。]

original: Visage: Ritual Participant
translation: 维瑟吉: 参加仪式

original: Taking light into the dark places.
translation: 带着光进入到黑暗的地带.

original: Visage: your Mask
translation: 维瑟吉:你的面具

original: The role assigned on the island of Visage.
translation: 维瑟吉为你分配的角色。

original: Vision of the Surface
translation: 地面的风景

original: Far above, the Sun remains. [In Venderbight, they're always eager for news of the Surface.]
translation: 在远远的高处, 阳光依旧闪耀。 [在文登湾, 他们一直渴望了解地面的景象与消息。]

original: Vital Intelligence
translation: 关键情报

original: Vitality and intelligence. What would we do without them? Especially if we're spies, diplomats, or pirates.
translation: 非常关键,非常有价值。 没了它们我们该做什么?尤其是当我们是间谍,外交官或者海盗的时候。

original: Wakeful Idol
translation: 警觉的雕像

original: Its eyes glitter with awareness. Its melancholy has dissipated: now you sense anticipation.
translation: 它的眼中闪着警惕的光. 它的忧郁已经消散: 现在你似乎有了某种预感.

original: Watchful Curio
translation: 警惕的古董

original: A sinister little squatting image... but its eyes are pleading.
translation: 一个看起来很阴险的小雕像。。。 但是它的眼神却带着某种恳求。

original: WE ARE CLAY
translation: 我們是粘土

original: WE WILL WORK. WE WILL ONLY WORK. [This trio of Clay stokers will reduce crew requirements, but also crew capacity, and will slightly increase engine power. They are fitted to an Auxiliary slot. When they are not in use, they will stand, patiently, hands by their sides, flat grey eyes unreadable. One will say, sometimes: "I LIKE IT WHEN IT IS QUIET."]
translation: 我們會工作。我們只會工作。 [这三个粘土司炉会降低你需要的船员数量,但是也会降低船员容量, 轻微提升引擎功率。它们放在辅舱槽位。当他们被卸下来时, 他们会耐心地站着,手牵着手,带着不可读的灰色眼神。 其中一个有时会说: "我喜歡它安靜的樣子。"]

original: Weeping Scar
translation: 哭泣的伤疤

original: Blood oozes slowly from the flesh around it, and is drawn into the scar.
translation: 血液缓慢地从它的四周溢出, 被吸入那个伤疤。

original: Whispering Trophy-Case
translation: 低语的战利品箱

original: "Oh yes, the Drowned Man is humming tonight, a song in the water like the bones of fish."
translation: "哦,是的, 今晚那个淹死的人在哼唱, 一首水中的歌就像鱼骨一样。"

original: Whisper-Locked Puzzle-Box
translation: 被密语锁住的谜题之盒

original: Speak the right phrase, and the tumblers will align and unlock it. But what is the right phrase? [The Alarming Scholar may have some ideas.]
translation: 说出正确的密语, 齿轮就会排成一列为盒子解锁。 但是正确的密语是什么? [令人惊恐的学者也许会知道些什么。]

original: White Mollyflower
translation: 白色鲈花

original: It is said you may eat it if you ever need to break an illusion at Dahut. But be cautious.
translation: 据说如果你需要打破达哈的幻境, 那么你需要吃掉它. 但是请小心.

original: Whithern Optical
translation: 何方聚光镜

original: Glass as clear as ice and sharp as salt.
translation: 像盐一样锋利,像冰一样透明的玻璃。

original: Wistful Deviless
translation: 怅然若失的女恶魔

original: She knows the uses of fire. But she's not cut out for the zee. Take her to London, and the Brass Embassy.
translation: 她知道火焰的用法。 但是她并不适应海泽。 把她带到伦敦, 去黄铜大使馆。

original: Witnessed: the Curator's End
translation: 目击: 监护官的结局

original: "...tomb-colonists do not exactly die. Many end in the Grand Sanatorium, withering slowly to insensate horror. (This is not publicised.) A few end in Emergence: transformation to a flimsy thing of wings and knowledge, an end in ecstacy, the delight of becoming an egg, of sorts. This is accounted a grand and vile and tempting sin..."
translation: "。。。死亡侨民不会完全死去。许多人的结局都在大疗养院里, 在没有感觉的恐惧中慢慢枯萎。 (这还没被公开过。)少数人的结局非常迅速: 转变成一种携带翅膀和知识的生物, 还有一种结局也许是升华, 成为一枚卵或者之类的东西。 这个值一千元以及邪恶和罪恶的诱惑。。。"

original: Wounding Truth
translation: 令人伤感的真相

original: You have told a truth that cuts deep.
translation: 你被告知了一项深深伤害到你的真相.

original: Wrack: A City with Ships to Save
translation: 船墟: 一个保存船只的城市

original: You cannot allow the Wreckers to claim innocents. Particularly innocents that may pay for their warning.
translation: 你不能允许船墟人危害无辜。 尤其是那些会为你的警告付钱的无辜。

original: Wrack: A Wrack Ritual
translation: 船墟: 废墟仪式

original: When two who are tethered first exchange a gift, the custom is to bury it in Dahut.
translation: 当被系缆拴住的两人第一次交换礼物时, 习俗是将礼物埋在达哈。

original: Wrack: Aiding Research
translation: 船墟: 帮助研究

original: The Severe Chemist wishes to study tether.
translation: 想要研究系缆藻的药剂师.

original: Wrack: For Want of a Mirror
translation: 船墟: 对镜子的欲望

original: The Fair King's most treasured possession. Incidentally, it contains the last vestige of Bourdain, who was one of the Seven Against Nidah.
translation: 平明王最珍视的财产。 顺带, 其中包含七人团之一布尔丹最后的那部分。

original: Wrack: New Prey for the Wreckers
translation: 船墟: 船墟人的新猎获

original: Go to the port and convince a few captains to zail over Wrack.
translation: 去往港口劝说船长开往船墟上方水域。

original: Wrack: Remembering
translation: 船墟: 回忆

original: Memories are coming to you.
translation: 回忆前来.

original: Wrack: Sapphire Blooms
translation: 船墟: 蓝宝石花簇

original: Something might grow in Dahut.
translation: 有些东西会在达哈生长。

original: Wrack: Scrap
translation: 船墟: 废品

original: From the very ship you doomed. Offer it in Wrack, and you may taste tether - taste love.
translation: 从每一艘被毁的船上收来。 将其交给船墟。 你就可以尝到系缆藻。 尝到爱的味道。

original: Wrack: Ships Sent to Wrack
translation: 船墟: 送去船墟的船

original: Your words will sink them into the zee.
translation: 你的言语将会把它们沉入海中。

original: Wrack: Tether Tastings
translation: 船墟: 系缆藻的味道

original: You have known love. It lingers.
translation: 你已经了解了爱。 爱不会消散。

original: Wrack: The State of the City
translation: 船墟: 城市的状况

original: The wreckers rely on the ships they sink to survive. How are they faring?
translation: 船墟的居民依赖于沉船. 他们是怎么发展的?

original: Wrack: Visions with the Bone
translation: 船墟: 关于骨的幻觉

original: What was, was.
translation: 往事, 如旧。

original: Wrack: Visions with the Cup
translation: 船墟: 关于酒杯的幻觉

original: What is, is.
translation: 是什么? 是什么。

original: Wrack: Visions with the Knife
translation: 船墟: 匕首的幻觉

original: What will be, will be.
translation: 将会是什么? 会是什么

original: Wrack: Your Relationship to the Fair King
translation: 船墟: 和平明王的关系

original: What are you to him?
translation: 你对他来说是什么?

original: Wretched Mog
translation: 不幸的莫格

original: Its perpetual ill temper does not endear it to the crew, but it does make it an effective ratter.
translation: 它的坏脾气让它失去了船员的宠幸,但是这也让它成为了一只很有效率的捕鼠者 。

original: XHearts
translation: 红心值

original: XIron
translation: 钢铁值

original: XMirrors
translation: 镜子值

original: XPages
translation: 书页值

original: XXXXXXNook: A Tolerance for Nookwater
translation: 旮旯: 耐受旮旯之水

original: You're able to breathe the oxygen-rich waters of Nook - for the time being.
translation: 你可以在富含氧气的旮旯水中呼吸 - 暂时的.

original: You Fear Nothing More Than Death
translation: 没什么比死亡更可怕

original: You Fear Something More Than Death
translation: 你对某些东西的恐惧甚于死亡

original: Your Father
translation: 你的父亲

original: A melancholy old rogue with a difficult debt. Take him home. [Be sure you have at least six thousand Echoes in cash when you do.]
translation: 背了一身债的忧郁老流浪汉。 带他回家。 [当你带他回伦敦时,请确认你身上有6000回声的现金。]

original: Your Father's Bones
translation: 父亲的遗骨

original: One set of bones looks much like another, but you know whose these really are.
translation: 这些遗骨看起来和普通的骷髅没什么两样,但是你知道这些骨头究竟是谁的.

original: Your Father's Bones: A Cold Trail
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 冰冷的痕迹

original: What next in the quest for your father's bones?
translation: 在你寻找父亲遗骨的路上,下一个难关是什么?

original: Your Father's Bones: a Legend's Heart for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王准备的传奇之心

original: The heart of one of the great monsters: Mt Nomad or the Tree of Ages, perhaps.
translation: 这是最强大的海怪:流浪之山或者世纪之树的心, 也许.

original: Your Father's Bones: a Miracle of Science for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王准备的科学奇迹

original: Bring an engine or weapon of unique brilliance. Your Officers can help.
translation: 带来一件卓越的引擎或者武器.你的船官会帮上忙的.

original: Your Father's Bones: a Sky-Light for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王准备的天空之光

original: Bring the Fathomking sunlight... or something which will pass for sunlight.
translation: 为深寻王带来阳光。。。 或者那些可以冒充阳光的东西。

original: Your Father's Bones: a Willing Guest for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王准备的一名自愿的宾客

original: Bring an Officer to the Fathomking. Choose someone who has finished their business on the zee, and might be willing to stay in the King's court. Probably someone who likes fish.
translation: 把一名船官带给深寻王. 选择一名完成了海上事务的船官, 而且想要留在深寻王的堡垒里的人. 也许某个喜欢海鲜的家伙会想要这么做.

original: Your Father's Bones: an Eldest's End for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王准备的一个远古之物的结局

original: The Fathomking wishes you to witness the death of something that is the oldest of its kind, and return.
translation: 深寻王想要你去见证一些最古老的存在的死亡, 并回来.

original: Your Father's Bones: Fruit of the Eternal Tree for the Fathomking
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 为深寻王带来的永恒之树的果实

original: Find the fruit of a tree which will not die.
translation: 找到那棵不死之树的果实.

original: Your Father's Bones: The Fathomking's Key
translation: 父亲的遗骨: 深寻王的钥匙

original: The Fathomking has given you what you need. Take it to your destination.
translation: 深寻王给了你需要的东西. 把它带到你的目的地去.

original: Zee-ztory
translation: 海泽轶事

original: Strange truths are told of the waves and what lies beneath. The lies are even stranger.
translation: 关于海浪和海浪下面的奇怪故事.那些海浪之下的要更奇怪些.

original: Zubmarine
translation: 潜艇

original: Press 'T' to transform your ship into a zubmarine and back.
translation: 按 'T' 来将你的船变形为潜艇或者变回船.

original: Zzoup
translation: 滋滋汤

original: The colour: old blood on snow. The taste: paprika, mushrooms, irony. The recipe: closely guarded.
translation: 汤的颜色就像是雪地上的风干血迹. 汤的味道就像是蘑菇,辣椒和铁锈混在一起的味道. 至于配方,被严格保密.

original: A Glimpse of Worlds through Honeyed Glass
translation: 对镜中世界的一瞥

original: Just how many doors does Prisoner's Honey open? This may unlock additional starting options in Zero Summer (see the bar above) and other StoryNexus worlds...
translation: 囚徒之蜜会打开多少扇门? 这会为你开启Zero Summer (查看上方提示条)的一个额外初始选项 以及其他StoryNexus 的游戏世界。。。

original: Cabinet Noir: Carte Blanche
translation: 黑屋: 全权委托

original: Something very special from the Red Eminence
translation: 来自红衣主教的非常特别之物

original: Endings: Gleam
translation: 结局: 微光

original: All's well that ends well. Gleam is gained from relatively happy endings.
translation: 结局好就万事大吉，微光是从相对幸福的结局中获得的。

original: Endings: Gloom
translation: 结局: 幽暗

original: More bitter than sweet. Gloom is gained from relatively grim endings.
translation: 相比于甜蜜, 更多的是苦涩. 这与恐怖结局相关.

original: Silver Tree: The Diplomat
translation: 银树: 外交官

original: Took a Master of the Bazaar captive!
translation: 活捉领主!

original: Silver Tree: The Echo
translation: 银树: 回声

original: Descended with Karakorum at its Fall
