translation: 与哈拉和林一同堕落

original: Silver Tree: The King of Kings
translation: 银树: 万王之王

original: became an adviser to a great ruler of the East
translation: 成为东方统治者的顾问

original: Silver Tree: The Road
translation: 银树: 长路

original: Escaped the Theft of Karakorum
translation: 从哈拉和林的陷落中逃离

original: StoryNexus: the Worldsmith
translation: StoryNexus: 世界匠

original: Failbetter has awarded this user Accredited Architect status
Sunless Sea
translation: 无光之海

original: Explore an ocean. Smuggle silk and souls. Devour your crew.
translation: 探索海洋.走私丝绸和灵魂.吞噬你的船员.

original: Sunless Sea: A Soothe & Cooper Long-Box
translation: 无光之海: 苏瑟&库珀 长箱

original: Don't open it.
translation: 请勿开启.

original: Sunless Sea: A Whisper-Locked Puzzle-Box
translation: 无光之海: 密语锁箱

original: It awaits the phrase that will open it.
translation: 它在等待一个短语来打开它。

original: Sunless Sea: Advice for the Navigator
translation: 无光之海: 航海家的建议

original: Listen.
translation: 聆听.

original: Sunless Sea: DLC Pirate-Poet
translation: 无光之海: DLC 海盗诗人

original: A renegade Clay Woman roams the zee, pillaging the ships of weaker captains.
translation: 一个变节的粘土女在海泽上游荡，掠夺弱小船长的船只。

original: Sunless Sea: DLC The Cladery Heart
translation: 无光之海: DLC 覆叶之心

original: An orphaned organ, once piloted by an organ orphan.
translation: 一种孤游器官，曾由孤游器官驾驶。

original: Sunless Sea: DLC Zubmariner
translation: 无光之海: DLC Zubmariner

original: You have purchased Zubmariner!
translation: 你已购买Zubmariner!

original: Sunless Sea: Feasting With Panthers
translation: 无光之海: 黑豹盛宴

original: You have unlocked the Parabolan Panther mascot in Sunless Sea!
translation: 你已在无光之海中解锁帕布拉豹！

original: Sunless Sea: Supping with Kittens
translation: 无光之海: 小猫晚餐

original: Play Sunless Sea to receive a Parabolan Kitten.
translation: 游玩《无光之海》以获得帕布拉的小猫

original: The Silver Tree: Pride
translation: 银树: 骄傲

original: Thwarted the Bazaar when it tried to take Karakorum
translation: 在巴扎试图占领哈拉和林时挫败它

original: The Silver Tree: The Herald
translation: 银树: 传令官

original: Gained immortality when Karakorum fell
translation: 在哈拉和林堕落后获得永生

original: Winterstrike: The Crescent Moon
translation: 冬日侵袭: 新月

original: You freed Iria - by unbinding the ironbird from winter...
translation: 你解放了伊莉亚 - 把铁鸟号从冬天解放出来...

original: Winterstrike: The Death of Art
translation: 冬日侵袭: 艺术之死

original: You used the ironbird's energies to change Iria forever, breaking the power of the Scarf and Feather Society
translation: 你用铁鸟的能量永远改变了伊莉亚，打破了围巾和羽毛协会的力量

original: Winterstrike: The Eater of Guards
translation: 冬日侵袭: 卫兵的食客

original: You used the ironbird's energies to change Iria forever, breaking the power of the Ocular Guard
translation: 你用铁鸟的能量永远改变了伊莉亚，打破了无名守卫的力量

original: Winterstrike: The Ferocity of Roses
translation: 冬日侵袭: 玫瑰的凶猛

original: You freed Iria - by utterly destroying the ironbird
translation: 你解放了伊莉亚 - 通过彻底摧毁铁鸟号。。。

original: Winterstrike: The Lullaby
translation: 冬日侵袭: 摇篮曲

original: You freed Iria - by killing the ironbird, but mercifully
translation: 你解放了伊莉亚 - 通过杀死铁鸟号,但是很仁慈

original: Winterstrike: The Miracle of Spores
translation: 冬日侵袭: 孢子的奇迹

original: You used the ironbird's energies to change Iria forever, breaking the power of the Circle of Bullets
translation: 你用铁鸟的能量永远改变了伊莉亚，打破了子弹圈的力量

original: Winterstrike: The Prophet
translation: 冬日侵袭: 先知

original: You joined yourself to the ironbird, to carry winter to city after city
translation: 你加入了铁鸟的行列，把冬天带到一个又一个城市

original: 1|Consequences wait.
translation: 1|等待结果.

original: 1|A cane of pale wood~2|A silvery restorative
translation: 1|一根苍白木手杖~2|一瓶银色药剂

original: 1|Someone is looking for passage~5|You welcomed a passenger aboard
translation: 1|有人在找船~5|你欢迎了乘客

original: 1|London~2|Khanate~3|Corsair~4|Zubmarine
translation: 1|伦敦~2|汗国~3|海盗~4|潜艇

original: 4|Abyss of Graves~2|Abyss of Pyres~3|Abyss of Pomegranates~1|Abyss of Scriptures
translation: 4|墓穴深渊~2|火葬深渊~3|石榴石深渊 ~1|经文深渊

original: 1|You performed the Ritual of Greeting~2|You performed the Ritual of Hearths~3|You performed the Ritual of Feasting~5|You are face to face with Her Ladyship~4|She is here~10|Lady Black will remember you
translation: 1|你完成了问候仪式~2|你完成了炉火仪式~3|你完成了盛宴仪式~5|你和女士已经面对面~4|她就在这里~10|黑女士会记住你

original: 0|You have forsaken a rite~1|The Rite of Greeting [This has increased your Hearts by 20 and reduced your Iron by 10.]~2|The Rite of Hearths [This has increased your Mirrors by 20 and reduced your Veils by 10.]~3|The Rite of Feasting [This has increased your Iron by 20 and reduced your Mirrors by 10.]~4|The Rite of Solace [This has increased your Veils by 20 and reduced your Hearts by 10.]
translation: 2|炉火仪式~3|盛宴仪式~4|慰藉仪式~1|问候仪式

original: 1|Lost in a Fire~2|New Sisters~3|Dark Duties~10|Above the Gulf of Corinth
translation: 1|消失在火焰中~2|新姐妹~3|黑暗的责任~10|柯林斯湾之上

original: 2|You are acquainted with the sisters~1|You know something of Hunter's Keep~20|You are acquainted with the sisters, but something has changed.
translation: 2|你认识了姐妹们~1|你知道了些关于猎户塔楼的事情~20|你认识了姐妹们,但是有些事情变化了.

original: 1|It is all just a mass of entrails to you~4|You have learned how the Fading Haruspex performs her rituals~5|Patterns begin to emerge~3|Your stomach no longer jumps at the thought of divination~2|You have seen a spark of the truth
translation: 1|这对你来说只是一堆乱糟糟的肠子~4|你学到了衰老的肠卜师是如何进行仪式的~5|图案开始浮现~3|想到占卜仪式的时候, 你的胃不再发颤~2|你看到了一丝真相的火花

original: 1|The echo of silver writing glimmers in the darkness. "IT TORE OUT THE HEART. THE SHAME REMAINED."~2|A scowling pirate cleans his teeth with a dagger. The Gant Pole's depths are a fine place to hide, for those who can find it.~3|The tunnel twists into three directions. You lick your finger. The slight breeze guides your feet.~4|A gust of fetid air rushes through the tunnel. The heart shudders for a moment.~6|Slivers of calcified heart rain down from the cracked ventricle roof.~7|This ventricle narrows to a tight gap. Fossilised fat deposits crack under your feet.~8|The light of your candle flickers. In the darkness behind you, footsteps.~9|A group of Old Zailors sits in a circle, tearing strips off a recently arrived whale with their rotten teeth.~10|One of the Fading Haruspex's disciples scurries past, arms weighed down with supplies from deeper in the Gant Pole.~11|A gentle hum guides your feet forwards. Your eyes feel heavy. Somewhere here is a place you can sleep. You have earned your rest. There is no need to awaken.~12|You brush your hand against the rippled edges of the tunnel. Another ventricle. Was it flesh before it was stone?~13|You pass an encampment of zailors. They stare at you, refusing to talk. You move onwards and deeper into the Heart.~14|Water drips from a crack in the roof. You taste it. Stale and stagnant. Brine aftertaste. Still better than thirst.~15|In the distance, someone whistles a zee-shanty. It might be you.~16|The echo of silver writing glimmers in the darkness. "REJOICE, FOR THE END ALWAYS COMES."~17|You pass a wall covered in chalk-malks. Whether they mark days, years, or something else, whoever made them has been here for a very long time.~18|For a moment, you see a glow in the distance. It fades as soon as you look up.~20|Every tunnel twists and turns. Is a little treasure really so much to ask for in such a grim place?~5|Down this tunnel, you pass one of the Old Zailors writing something on the wall. In the light, it is invisible. In the darkness, illegible.~19|You pass a shack made of hide. The owner sleeps inside, gently breathing despite the polished bone of his skeleton visible through the decay and great chunks of devoured flesh. He cackles to himself about something in his dream, rolls over, and begins to snore.
translation: 1|银色字迹的微光在黑暗中闪烁着. "它撕裂了心. 耻辱依旧在."~2|一个皱眉的海盗用匕首清洁他的牙齿. 刚特极点的深处对于那些能找到它的人而言是一个隐藏的好地方.~3|隧道向三个方向旋转着, 你舔舔手指, 微风在你脚边吹拂.~4|一阵清新空气冲过隧道 心脏颤抖了一会儿..~6|钙化的心脏碎片从顶部如雨般坠落.~7|心室变窄了. 石化的脂肪堆积在你的脚边~8|烛光颤抖着.在你身后的黑暗中, 有些脚步声.~9|一群老水手围坐一团, 用腐烂的牙齿撕咬着一只刚来的鲸鱼.~10|一名肠卜者的学徒快步通过 手中提着来自刚特极点深处的补给品.~11|一阵温和的低哼引导你向前，但是你的眼皮变得沉重。 附近有个可以睡觉的地方, 你可以休息, 没必要醒来.~12|你用手拂过隧道的锯齿状边缘, 另一个心室, 那些石头曾经全是血肉吗?~13|你经过了一个水手的营地. 他们看着你, 拒绝说话. 你继续向心脏深处前进.~14|水滴从顶部裂缝处滴落, 你尝了尝, 很污秽, 很咸, 就连回味也充满了卤水味. 不过还是比口渴的感觉好.~15|远处有些人吹着口哨, 旋律是水手们的船歌. 它可能是你.~16|银色字迹的微光在黑暗中闪烁着. "為終將到來的結局, 舉杯慶祝吧."~17|你经过了一面有着白垩记号的墙壁. 无论那记号记录的是日, 月, 年, 还是什么其他的东西, 记录的东西一定在这里呆了很长很长时间.~18|某一瞬间, 你看到了一丝来自远方的微光. 但当你细看, 它又消失了. ~20|每条隧道都扭曲旋转着. 在这样黑暗的地方要求一点点财宝真的很过分吗?~5|沿隧道向下走, 你经过了一名正在墙上写着什么的老水手. 在光照下, 它消失了, 只剩下黑暗, 只剩下不可辨认的黑暗.~19|你经过了一座毛皮搭的小屋, 主人在里睡觉, 轻轻呼吸着.尽管你透过大块血肉都能看到他被抛光的颅骨. 他在梦中咯咯说着什么, 然后翻了个身,开始打呼噜.

original: 1|"There is a question waiting. It travelled in a ship long wreck’d. Find it."~2|"The beast is tethered - but not forever. Refuge comes to London." ~3|"They were seven and they shall be seven again. Their names may change but the number remains." ~4|"The names of the heirs to Nidah will begin with M, A, R, I - which is rebellion." ~5|"Beneath the waves, two cities live. They grow. They hunger."~6|"Beware Anthe. It will change you. You will be sharp, keen as a knife’s edge."~7|"The wound reopens; the flesh will not heal. Bring them your remorse." ~8|"They yearn for it: Liberty, Equality, Eternity."~9|"They are only mortal. They suffer too: Vitality, Infirmity, Fatality."~10|"The preacher travels to the bell tower. The bell, it- Oh god. That's horrid." ~11|"The one they fear waits in a pale cavern. The walls are carved with prophecies."~13|"The dream is great and ancient. It is fuelled by deeds of horror; none will have strength to deny it." ~14|"Wheels turn within wheels; a king yearns for your hand."~15|"One joins us below. The trespasser does not surface." ~16|"A question will not go unanswered indefinitely."~18|"The Salted will rise above the waves. They will find only their graves."~19|"An ancient beast wakes when the trespasser’s light pierces the abyss. The trespasser shall never know peace; only terror." ~20|"There shall be a new horizon. All shall know it - but the king’s city will witness it first." ~12|"The Soldier fled, and smothered himself in freedom."~17|"Freedom is fragile. The beast will wake."
translation: 1|"有个问题正在等着. 它在一艘早已沉没的船中游荡. 找到它."~2|"野兽被拴住了 - 但不会被永远拴住. 难民们会去伦敦." ~3|"曾经有七个人. 将来也会再次有七个人. 他们的名字也许会变, 但是七这个数字会留下来." ~4|"尼达继承人的名字会以玛利开头 - 那是个反抗者." ~5|"波浪之下, 还活着两座城市. 他们成长着. 他们很饿."~6|"小心安忒. 它会改变你. 你会变得锐利, 像刀’s刃一样."~7|"伤口会再次打开; 血肉无法治疗. 将你的同情与悔恨带去." ~8|"他们渴望着: 自由, 平等, 永恒."~9|"他们只是凡人. 他们也会受苦: 生命, 疾病, 死亡."~10|"牧师去往钟塔. 那钟. 那 哦,天啊. 那好可怕." ~11|"他们害怕的那个在一个昏暗的洞窟中. 墙壁上雕刻着寓言."~13|"那梦境伟大而古老. 被恐惧之约饲育着; 没人有力量拒绝它." ~14|"轮子在轮子中旋转; 一个王渴望你们的双手."~15|"有什么在下面加入了我们. 入侵者不会浮起." ~16|"一个问题不会一直得不到回答."~18|"盐墙从浪涛中升起. 他们会找到自己的墓地."~19|"当入侵者的光照亮深渊. 巨兽会醒来. 入侵者永远找不到和平; 只能找到恐惧." ~20|"会有一道新的地平线. 所有人都会知道. 但是王的城市将会第一个见证." ~12|"战士逃跑了, 在自由中让自己窒息而死."~17|"自由易碎. 巨兽会醒."
